There are only 10 sections and each is about 15 pages long, you can complete this book in 10 days and spend a few more studying the exam questions then pass the test.

This holder does exactly what it is designed to do - hold brushes. But be very careful when moving it! Instinctively, I picked it up like any other round object, by the sides. All of my brushes slipped out because the bottom grating is too short. I am tempted to wrap paper around the round side to make it more like a can.

I wanted to save a few bucks and try one of these. It nearly cost me my Formosa, which flew excellently with an AR6110. It felt like the model only had 3 positions for the flight controls, up center, and down. The model was barely controllable in a 70' area. Flight controls looked fine on the ground before and after landing. Switched back to the AR and it flew great. Unfortunately I am out of the return window so the very least I can say is use are your own risk, and do not think about using one of these in rotary craft.

I needed a battery to replace my 4 year old Eflight 3200mah pack that was only giving 5 minutes a flight. This new pack is giving me 10 minute flights with a 3lb quad. It is slightly heavier at 290 grams but I cannot notice the difference in the air. I think it is a little more expensive than other brands but it definitely does not feel like a China battery.
These sleeves are pretty useful if you have multiple things you want to capture video from but need to keep it easy to remove. I just wish they were not so expensive

It works pretty good for average sized lemons, oranges, and limes. I wish there was a little more lever action though. The nice thing is that the fruit's skin forms a seal and does not squirt at your eyes when juicing.

I purchased these for use on 450 size helicopters and do not recommend them at all. The smaller U for connecting ball links is too narrow and does not fit around short ball links, plus the metal is too thick to wedge in between the ball and frame on short joints.The metal and handles are very low quality and feels like a dollar store tool. I returned them, it is pretty hard to mess up ball link pliers.

They work on my ancient Trex 450 XL but are slightly longer than the original ones (nothing a dremel cannot take care of). The inside diameter is 4.5mm if you are planning to use these on another helicopter.
It's an old simulator but it is perfect for learning how to fly. It runs at 200+fps on my 2009 laptop which won't handle newer simulators because they are all graphic intense.

I wanted to get back into shape and bought this mat. After a month of owning it, it still curls up at the edges and does not lay perfectly flat. Usually I put 30lb weights down to hold my feet while doing sit ups so it does not bother me. The foam is thick enough to relieve stress on my wrist when doing pushups and my tailbone no longer aches after situps.

This is a great little display. It is half the price as the Adafruit version, uses fewer I/O pins, and uses the same libraries.  The display is ever so slightly less bright, but it is not an issue at all unless you are directly this to comparing the Adafruit one.To get the display running, install the Adafruit_SSD1306 library from their website/github. For whatever reason, they decided to make the library in such a way that you have to edit the .h file. Look around line 55-57ish and comment out the 128_32 reference  and uncomment the 128_64 line. My device came with an address of 0x3C which was different from the documentation. You can use the arduino wire scanner sketch which scans the I2C bus for all possible addresses. Change the main .ino sketch to the right address and you should be ready to rock.

This book is pretty useless. The example questions are along the lines of "What is the difference between synthesis and analysis?". They list definitions in bullet point format then copy and paste the same text into a table right next to the list. Ever have that professor who talks and talks in monotone but buries critical details in his life story? That is what it is like reading this book. Each page is a wall of text with nearly no examples. When there are examples, they are either easy or absurdly difficult with little explanationIf you want to get good at circuits, go to MIT open courseware and use that.

These handles came with a weight Gold's Gym dumbbell set but the quality of them is abysmal. First, these are available at walmart for 5 bucks each. I didn't think it was possible to mess up designing a weight handle but alas, they did. The grip is rubber, it smells awful and probably contains some cancer causing chemicals. Even after using these handles for 3 weeks now, the smell has not subsided and my hands smell like I just got done playing in an adult toy store. The weights press up against the rubber, eventually the rubber will crack and fall apart. The paint also chips off the screw threads and makes a pretty bad mess. If you are just getting started in weight lifting, these might be ok but I would highly recommend getting all metal bars.

I am a student and would occasionally use this to help go to sleep, maybe 2-3 times per 7 day week for a single month. And then classes ended for winter break and my sleep cycle was absolutely chaotic. Up all night, sleep all day or awake for 20 hours plus without the slightest feeling of sleepiness. It took a full 5 weeks to reset my sleep cycle because of this stuff after I quit using it.So yes, it does work very well, but do not use it frequently!

I am trying to eat a little healthier and bought this to make smoothies. It works very well and the price is not bad at all. But there is one thing I learned on the first use. If you remove the adapter cap, the blade shaft will pull out of the pin and rest slightly to the side. This happened to me and I tried to blend something right after without checking. The shaft with blades ended up slashing the inside of the pitcher pretty bad.
There isn't much to say, this adapter was inexpensive and works as advertised.
I needed a few replacement tips for my el'cheapo SMD workstation iron. These work pretty well but they are not Hakko by any means. If you are just a hobbiest, these will do just fine.

The HC-SR04 is a pretty decent range finding sensor and really shines with the right Arduino Library. There are a few different libraries but newPing is the most common I think and is a little more advance. The downside is that newPing  uses a timer and interrupts which interferes with other libraries like Servo. My preferred method of using this sensor is just to use pulseIn and do the math in between frames.
A little expensive and lacks useful features like a reset button. I believe the newer model has a button for resetting the Xbee. The board works just fine with my Xbee + Arduino though.

I wanted to stock up on small breadboards. Most hobby electronic ships (Sparkfun, Adafruit..) charge an arm and a leg for these things. They are just a hair lower quality than the expensive ones but they do the job just fine and are inexpensive. Worst case scenario, you can use them to hold header pins in during soldering.

I received mine for free with a larger crockpot. I thought it would be great for individual meals (being a college student) but it simply does not get hot enough to even heat canned ravioli. I have left it on for 1 1/2 hours and the food is lukewarm. I really want to like this, it is the perfect size for a dorm but it does not get hot enough to even keep gravy warm. A better investment would be to buy a convection oven, it is more versatile

Teensy controllers are great! They surpass Arduino literally in every single aspect - number of I/O, speed, comm ports, memory, and so on. What makes them better is that pretty much every Arduino library is compatible with Teensy controllers. You might have to change a few pins around but I have not had any serious issues yet. Plus, you can program the Teensy in several other languages with a more formal IDE instead of Arduino. I think of these as the stepping stone to more serious work with the Easy Option still available. For example, this thing can do all sorts of sweet tricks, like pretending to be a keyboard, mouse, MIDI, flight control for simulator, FULL speed serial communications over USB(!), DSP, and it even has pins for touch input! (There are a few Arduinos that can do the mouse/keyboard stuff but are not as integrated to the OS)There really is no downside but there are a few things that should be mentioned.  These are not directly compatible with Arduino shields because of the physical shape; you will have to make an adapter.  You will also have to be competent with a soldering iron, I recommend vertical male headers on the long sides and horizontal pins on the short edge to make it breadboard friendly.The last thing I think should be noted is the Teensyduino installer. It is pretty dead simple to use, but there is an option for you to install additional libraries. This is both good and bad. I selected "install all libraries", and it did - straight into the actual Arduino IDE and NOT in the user installed libraries. This is important to know about because I nearly went insane trying to figure out why one of my libraries was capable of compiling without the .h file, turns out a copy was installed with Teensyduino. On a Mac, I simply went to applications > arduino > right click > show package contents > contents > resources > java > libraries and selected all of the non-stock libraries then placed them into my sketchbook > libraries (the one for user installed libs) and was able to have the best of both worlds.I would recommend buying one from the big A but I would not recommend more than 3 from here. They tack on a ~6 shipping fee per board which is only worth $20 at sparkfun. After your 3rd board, you could have had a free one!

I was a little hesitant to buy bulk lasers from China but I was willing to take a $5 risk. Mine arrived in just 2 weeks and each one works just fine at 5v but might last longer on 3.7v. They are about as bright as a standard keychain laser but they are much smaller and they did not seem to heat up at all which is good. There isn't a lot of circuitry so I would suspect that it might be beneficial to power these with a buck-booster/constant current driver but I am not a laser expert. The only thing is, I don't know what I want to make that features 10 lasers!

This little display is great - it is half the price of the Adafruit version and does not have a multitude of wires. The display works with the Adafruit_SSD1306 Arduino library. For those unfamiliar with that library, be sure to open the .h file, look for line 54-56 which will have a few lines of #define's. Simply leave the one that has 128x64 uncommented and comment out the other display sizes. There is a jumper on the back of this display to let you select the I2C address. Mine said it was 0x78 but was actually 0x3C (the Adafruit library is set to 0x3D by default). Also, the listing says this board is 3 to 5 volts, but I know the Adafruit ones are either 3 or 5 volt. Since this board probably isn't as well built, I decided to run it only on 3.3 volts straight off my Arduino. And I also should mention the upper ~20-25% of this display is yellow and the lower section is a teal blue - it isn't a dual color display where every pixel's color is selectable.
There isn't much to say, it is a well built but inexpensive HDMI cable that functions as expected.

The Skip Hop 3 Piece Explore and More Egg Shaker Toys are adorable. This set is perfect for boys and girls! I'm personally loving the adorable forest animal theme! This set features a hedgehog, owl, and fox. The shakers are the perfect size for babies 3 months old and up and can easily be held in the palm of little hands. The toys are PVC-free and Phthalate-free ensuring the safety of baby when playing with or putting them in their mouth.Each of the animals make a different rattling noise and feature a different raised textured on the bellies. The hedgehog has little bumpy textures for it's quills on its back! The colors are attractive not being too soft or overly bright. These little egg shaker toys will make playtime more fun whether learning about new textures, sounds, or in making noise to match the rhythm of a song. I see these toys being played with as baby grows into a toddler and beyond. My 7 year old and 4 year old are even fans of this adorable little shaker set! I feel it's a wonderful set for any baby and would make a fabulous gift to receive for expecting parents (especially if you don't know the sex of the baby yet)!

These refrigerator liners come in a set of 6. Measurements of each liner is 12X24 and can be easily cut to the specific size needed for each desired resting place. I like these are reversible so if I want to change things up or prefer one pattern style over the other I can use it. The material wasn't what I was expecting. I was expecting something more slick or vinyl like but instead each liner is soft and absorbent. The liners aren't very thick but are great at absorbing  spills.I adore the fact that when these need cleaned I can simply just throw them in the wash without worry to use again and again. These air dry and since they are thin it doesn't take too long. You'll just want to flip it over to let both sides dry before placing back in the fridge. The liner comes out look just as good as when I first used them! There's no wrinkle, bumps, or off putting wear. The liners retain shape very well.Aside from keep the shelves clean, these are a better choice than disposable liners. These also since there's a bit of softness prevent produce from shifting around in drawers and bruising.These liners are saving me precious time when it comes to deep cleaning the fridge! My only regret is not discovering these sooner. I highly recommend them!

The  Lenox 2015 Disny's Fa La La Fairy (Tinker Bell) Ornament is exceptionally beautiful. There are zero flaws as far as I can see. This ornament is of very high quality. It's light in weight so as to not hang low on my tree. It can be hung using my own hooks or solely from the golden cord attached on top of the ornament.  Even though the ornament is light it doesn't feel cheap. I like that the ornament comes in a velvet lined box in which the ornament can be stored when not in use. It's the perfect ornament for collectors and the box is dated so you'll know what year it's from. My daughter is a huge Tinkerbell fan and adores this ornament so I've gifted it to her and will pass it along when she's grown for her own tree. I feel like we'll be collecting more from Lenox in the future. I would highly recommend this ornament for any Disney or Tinkerbell fan!

The Safety 1st Grow and Go 3-in-1 Car Seat is awesome! This seat will take us all the way from newborn (5lbs) to booster (40-100lbs) without the need to purchase any other seat making it a huge bargain! The seat is back facing and forward facing when the child reaches the intended weight, age, and height requirements. I'm loving how easy this seat is to clean! The seat cover can be thrown in the washer and dryer! I used to have to wash car-seat covers by hand but now no more!Installing the car seat was as simple as most other car seats I've installed.  Adjusting the car seat to fit was a lot easier than other car seats. There's an adjustment mechanism in the back that is far easier than unthreading and rethreading the belts through slots. The seat takes up less space than other bulkier seats we've used in the past. This is very important because we have to seat three kids in the backseat of our car. This seat has given plenty of wiggle room to keep all three of our kids comfortable.The straps that hold children in place are strong and the buckle not easy for them to detach on their own but not a strain on parents either.There's two cup holders for long trips, or one for a cup and the other for other items, snacks for example. The seat can be adjusted to a number of reclining positions. The seat feels sturdy and safe, with plenty of padding and comfort for our kids. There's been no complaints. We totally recommend this carseat!

I had some issues assembling the boat, as the instructions seemed unclear. Then, just before I was about done, I turned the page over to see I was looking at the wrong side. That said, it wasn't that hard, just confusing, but it was my own fault.There are stickers to affix to the pieces and they fit as expected.The toy's main features work well for the most part. A few bits are fiddly, but they seen sturdy enough. You can move a few pieces around to customize it as well. The features that flips one of the bots out and transforms it into a boat at the same time is rather neat!My four year old son is a big Rescue Bots fan and really likes this toy! He's played with it a lot since I gave it to him. We kinda wish some of the characters included weren't cardboard but the really cool transforming robot makes up for it!

My husband does the grilling around here so below are his thoughts on this product....Ever since I took a BBQ class, my grilling skills have increased, and the food tastes much better. This thermometer kicked it up even a few more notches.After installing the included batteries, it's easy to pair the remote wireless sensor to the thermometer. It just takes a couple button pressed. Best to read how before turning them on, or you might have to turn them off and back on again.Setting the sensor alarms, one for the grill temp and another for the piece of food you put the second probe into, isn't complicated, but if you want to set lower than the default, you have to hold the buttons until they go all around. The default temp is higher than any of the recommended minimum temperatures listed in the instructions!That aside, the instructions are clear and explain the various modes, and how to set them up. Using this allowed me to get the meat off the grill at just the right time, instead of having to put it back to cook longer, or have it overcooked. Opening the grill to check temps increases cook time, so using this device help the food finish sooner as well, since I didn't have to open the grill at all.Naturally, of your coals are not evenly hot, various pieces of meat will good at different times, so you have that to watch out for. The probes, that you put inside the flaming hot grill are also hot, and should not be touched with bare hands until cool. Use a hot pad or glove. I totally didn't touch them on accident. Nope, not me! (anyone got an ice pack?)If you grill, and you want your food to be cook right, and you want to be able to be in the kitchen or elsewhere but still be able to know what the temp is, and have a warning if the grill is cooling or your food is just about done, this is a great choice.

The Neutrogena Healthy Skin Blends Clean Translucent Oil-Control Powder has been wonders for my skin. I typically have oily skin and because of my recent pregnancy, my skin has become even oiler.  I feel each of the blends have given my skin a natural vibrant look with appearing shiny. The application is easy and I can blend how I please using my preferred powder brush.  Brushes aren't included with these powders. The containers are transparent and keep closed well. A little bit of the powders seem to go a long way.Out of the three blends I've been using the Clean for my my entire face and the Pure for my blush areas. The Sunkissed shade is just a little bit too dark for my skin right now. The Sunkissed is a dark shade and would be best suited for darker skin tones or to be worn during the Summer time when my skin is a bit darker for a bronzing affect.  I like I can play with the palette to find my perfect shade.  The makeup goes on well and cleans off pretty easily. I am happy with the results of each of these powders and will continue to use them.

The Platinum Plated Sterling Silver Garnet and White Topaz Halo Heart Pendant Necklace is darling. It's 18" inch length rest not too short or too long when worn.  The chain is small and quite delicate. It can become easily tangled if not being careful. However, I like the chain. I feel the sizing width wise of the chain is perfect and spotlights the pendant nicely. The clasp is small but I had no trouble putting the necklace on or taking it off on my own.The pendant is garnet. At first my husband thought the heart color was black! It's pretty dark to the eye if being worn in a not brightly lit area. The color is certainly something to keep in mind if you are hoping for a brighter red.  The necklace comes in a box that's nice for gifting and perfect for storage. The necklace doesn't feel or look cheap. It's got just the right amount of sparkle! It's a nice accent to casual or dressier attire. I feel this is a great piece to add to ones jewelry collection whether young or old.

These pants were a little big for my son but I know in the months ahead they are sure to fit. He's wearing 5 but he's not near size 6 just yet. The length is long. The material the pants are made out of are good for the cooler months. My son prefers these to jeans. There are two pockets on each side. Care is simple as the pair is both machine and dryer compatible. Overall a good pair of pants that are great for the most active of boys and for kids that don't like jeans!

The Fisher-Price Roller Blocks Rockin' Wagon is a great toy that grows with a child. It features two different ways to play which are in a standing pulling position or for a crawler that is more accustomed to a sitting position. Other than installing batteries into the toy and popping 3 pieces into place the toy is ready to go! Very minimal putting together is always a plus when a little one receives a toy and wants to play with it right away.  The toy is well made, there are no sharp edges, potential places were little fingers could get pinched, etc.The back of the wagon (holding area) features a tailgate that can be closed or opened. The blocks tumble out and rock back in forth stopping baby to pick them back up and place them inside if they wish. Each of the blocks feature cute designs and faces that are all different and interesting to look at it. I like that if my baby isn't ready for the walking/pulling stage of this toy that the handle can be folded underneath with very little effort. The music and silly sounds can be turned off or on and there are two volume control modes. Lots of fine motor skills on cognitive skills will be challenged and mastered by playing with this toy. Pushing, pulling, twisting, stacking, there's a lot for a baby to do. It's a gender neutral toy perfect for a boy or a girl.  I recommend it!

Dragon's Gold is an artfully crafted negotiation game from renowned game designer Bruno Faidutti. Each round you place one of your party members on a dragon to fight it. Once the attack values of the attackers matches or exceeds the health of the dragon, the treasure is split up in a negotiation process including everyone who participated.Everyone involved has 1 minute to make a deal everyone can agree on to split the loot. Factors to consider are your own goals, what you think other people might have, and if there are wizards and thieves. Someone with a thief gets to steal from someone after the fact, so maybe they deserve less, and anyone who played a wizard who gets a red treasure also gets magic items.The magic items can shift the game by moving treasures around, gaining extra items, or cancelling a successful dragon slaying, and other actions. These add that extra bit of strategy to really fiddle with the game to your benefit, or at least to mess with what other people are doing.This game is loads of fun. You have to balance getting what you want with giving up enough to at least get something. Someone who is greedy might end up with little or nothing, while the players who cooperate with each other continue to gain. The turns go quickly, and players can stay engaged by counting up the attack totals and deciding which dragon to attack next, such as deciding if they can get in on the action with others, or try and take one out themselves with the available plays before their next turn comes around.The only issue I have with the game is the gold and silver treasures. In certain lights they are so similar it is really hard to tell them apart. I'm considering getting some sort of paint to spray the gold pieces to make them more distinct. I think in a white light they would be clearer, but in softer lights they don't stand out.I've played this game with out 7 year old daughter who I clearly have taught to well how to be devious, as she has made some real stinker moves for her gain with the magic cards. We've only played with the advanced rules, but there is a version without the magic items. I don't imagine this being as much fun, but it might allow our 4yo son who is just starting to read to be able to play, as there is no reading required other than the magic items.I recommend this game as a must buy if you like a lot of interpersonal interaction and negotiation in your games. Even if not, it's a good game with nice art, quality pieces, and engaging game play.

B is for Bear: A Natural Alphabet by Hannah Viano celebrates nature! I really like this book and so do my four and seven year old children. The artistic style is fun to look at. Most of the prints I wouldn't even mind framing and putting on the wall of my kids room. The colors used are bright, bold, or over the top but fit the theme of the book very well.The words in the book can challenge young children and grow their vocabulary. We see that F is for Fawn, and D is for Dandelion but the book moves to be more challenging than those basic examples. In this book, Q stands for Queen Anne's Lace and Y for Yellow-Bellied Sapsucker. Following the letter and the word for the illustration, there's a short sentence that shares important information on each subject.This book gets props from me for being educational as well as quite interesting.  I feel this book will become a long time favorite for all of my children.

The DII 16-Piece Bathroom Starter Set is a bargain! I feel this is a great set for those that don't want to break the bank to give the bathroom a design face-lift. This set includes a shower curtains, curtain rings, lotion or soap dispenser, and a cup. You pretty much have everything but a couple of rugs and towels to finish off your entire bathroom! The quality is moderate and reasonable for the price. This set would be perfect for newly weds, college students, a guest bathroom, or your main bathroom if you just like to change things up every so often.The curtain is easy to care for and can be thrown in the wash since it's made out of 100% polyester. I prefer using the curtain with a liner to extend the life and to prevent my curtain from being too transparent.The City Scape design is off New York. It looks like it was had sketched and it's quite appropriate for either men or women. Everything was packed well upon arrival. The pieces didn't have any off putting smells to complain about either. I recommend it!

The DII Oceanique Machine Washable 100% Cotton Chenille Pop Corn Luxury Spa Bath Rug is a great bathroom addition. The cheerful shade of yellow brightens the room up without being over the top. The pop corn style of threading adds a bit of style and element of interest among all other accessories.The rug is durable and stitched appropriately. It's a got a bit of weight so it doesn't slip and slide all over the place.  If needing cleaned this rug can easily be thrown into the wash and dried out in the open. It absorbs water well and dries quickly.  The 17x24 size fits my small bathroom well whether I'm choosing to place it in front of my shower or sink area. It's a nice choice for the price and seems to be holding up well.

Fluxx Dice is an add-on to any Fluxx deck. It adds two dice and a five cards to the game. When the game starts, you roll dice to see how many cards to draw and play. These new rules can be removed or changed like any other rules in the game as normal.Since the dice start in play, the game starts with with more randomness. Maybe not best for a new player to start with these in play, but for veteran players, it'll give some freshness.If you frequently play Fluxx then this would be a good edition. If you don't play much, it might be worth passing. The cost it a little high in my opinion for an expansion that could be removed from play the first turn. It is fun though, and the custom dice are of good quality.

The  TL Care Organic Cotton Mittens in the natural color way for 0-3 Months olds are nice. The size is bit big for newborns so I would suggest these for 1-3 months instead. The material is very soft. It's thin enough to be breathable for the skin but also thick enough not to wear out quickly after a good amount of use. I really liked that the material doesn't have any off putting smells and that's it's organic. The seams are strong and the elastic isn't overly tight. These are a must have for babies. My first born went without  mittens when she was very little and did end up scratching her eye and having to go to the doctor for treatment for it. No major damage and nothing a few days with medication couldn't  remedy but it could have been prevented. I recommend these to all parents of babies. Protecting your little ones for scratching accidents is important! I highly recommend these.  This set is a nice gender natural coloring that would work perfectly for a boy or girl.

The  Makerskit Mason Herb Garden Gift Set has everything one would need to start herbs in their home. There are no paper instructions with the kit, instead one is pointed to the Makerskit website where a full instructional video for this and other kits are available. After following the demonstrative instructions I waited only a couple of days before these herbs sprouted! I was impressed on how fast the seeds germinated!This is great little kit perfect as a house warming gift or for someone that has wanted to delve into growing their herbs and wary about where to start. The mason jars, labels, and plant marking flags are simplistic and altogether look great sitting in my kitchen. I wouldn't hesitate in the least bit to purchase this kit for someone I know. Visual learners I feel will really appreciate the video instructions and the helpful hints, tips, and a bit of history shared by the folks over at Makerskit. Totally recommend this!

Five Minutes with Jesus By Shelia Walsh is a lovely hardcover devotional book. The author shares short stories that will impact, convict, inspire, and move one to grow closer with God.  I like how even though the devotionals are shorter that there is still a lot to each of them to ponder and apply to my daily life.In this book, there are 50 devotionals for daily reading. If read daily, this book will last one about a month in a half.  The book is in hardcover format and features an attractive blue and white floral design on the outer cover as well as on the inner-pages. I typically like to read my devotions in the early morning hours but that doesn't always happen. So I appreciate even more the small size of this book. It's size makes it easy to slip into a purse or tote to bring along with me wherever I may go and makes it always ready for whenever I have the time read it.Every devotion begins with a title, short devotion with a point to ponder, and a five minutes in the Word section. The five minutes in the Word section list many Bible verses that correspond with the devotional. I like so much scripture is included! I can go over the scripture again and again and ponder it's truths for my life and that's something I very much appreciate.The devotionals aren't numbered or dated so there's no pressure if you miss a day. I would have loved if there was a ribbon bookmark included in the book to keep my spot but it's still fine without it. This book is a wonderful choice to bless someone else with or to keep for yourself. We all have busy times and seasons in our life, so it's nice to have a Word of Encouragement to grow in God such as this to turn too. I certainly recommend this book.Required Federal Trade Commission disclaimer: I was provided a complimentary copy of this book by the BookLook blogger review program in exchange for an honest review.

I knew my husband would appreciate this shirt. A cold winter is expected and I want him to have quality tops from trusted brands that will last and  keep him warm. This shirt fits that bill! It looks great on my husband and it's easy to care for. I asked him to share his thought on it below.Husband's thoughts: If it's cold out, a warm, comfortable shirt is key. This shirt is both of those things! It's not itchy, it's warm, and stylish too!I've worn it with a t-shirt and without and both were comfortable.The shirt feels durable and well made, with a lined collar.It has two breast pockets with buttons. The buttons are securely sew on.The fit is nice and comfortable. Sleeves are the right length.

The DII Oceanique Machine Washable 100% Cotton Ribbed Woven Luxury Spa Bath Rug in cool brown is nice. The brown is almost a gray, in my opinion. It pairs will with many colors like yellow and blue. If a bathroom is beach themed, I feel this rug would fit perfectly.The rug is just the right size to sit in front of our shower or take residence at the foot of our sink. The material is comfortable to step on and it's very absorbent. The rug does  slide on the floor a bit because it doesn't have a rubber backing and I feel this is something to be aware of. The rug is easy to clean in the wash and it lays flat after drying. Drying time only took a couple of hours after being run through the wash. Since use and washing, there's been no signs of the edges unraveling meaning the rug is made well! I like also that it doesn't seem to pick every fuzz ball or piece of lint.If looking for an affordable option, this rug is a decent choice that won't break the bank!

I'm quite impressed by the 100% PEVA (Non-Toxic) Shower Curtain Liner from Smarty Pants Supplies. This liner is extremely durable and of high quality.  I noticed right away that this liner doesn't smell! I'm sensitive to smells so not having  weird chemical smells linger in my home is a huge plus.This curtain has 12 rust-proof metal grommets. The grommets are tightly in place and I feel they can withstand normal tugging and pulling very well. The bottom edge of the liner features three encased magnets that have a moderately strong hold to keep the liner in place while showering. The weight of the curtain provides one with the peace of mind that it won't easily tear or move around with the steam of the shower and cling to us!This liner I report is holding up very well! I just love the fact it's able to withstand mold, mildew, and bacterium so well. My bathroom is not well ventilated so we've been battling these inconveniences a lot. It's great to have a liner that's resistant!  A good spray down of hydrogen peroxide and wipe down every other month and this liner is sure to hold up for a long time. I highly recommend it and feel strongly that it's worth the price. *I received this in exchange for an honest review*

This headset graces the top of your head with delicate comfort, and fills your ears with the might and magic of gaming.This headset is designed for the PlayStation, but an adapter will allow you to use it on PC as well, and that is how we tested it.It plugs into the standard audio ports (or PS controller). There is a switch to mute/unmute the mic. There is no volume controller on the cord of the kind you might find on a USB headset. On the plus, there's no blaring light on said volume controller that seems to be all the rage these days.The rig on which the speakers are on is a delight to wear. As you place it on your head, you naturally adjust the fitting to the contours of your pate, and it sits there quite placidly, not being intrusively heavy or oppressive to your ears. No bending the cartilage leading discomfort.The sound is of good quality. It sounds better for gaming than music when I tested it. But there is a wide range of sound. Even plugging it into my tablet provided some rather stunning sounds from the game.This Steel Series headset is quite comfortable, sounds great, and is portable from console, to PC, to mobile device.

I love having lights up year around but most aren't energy efficient, long lasting, or the best thing for our monthly electric bill. I don't typically do outdoor lights because that would mean having extension cords throughout the yard, timers set up, etc. It's just more of a hassle than it's worth. Though in the back of my mind, I just kept wondering if there was a better way!I was excited to learn about the ZITRADES Solar Fairy String Lights. The multi-colored light string is great for brightening up any indoor or outdoor space for short or long term use! For my family, these have eliminated numerous decorative lighting issues we've come across.The strand is 57 feet long and features 200 lights that flash, twinkle, and stand still depending on what mode set on! There are eight total light modes to chose from. Modes can be changed by pushing a button on the back of the solar panel. My personal favorite is the twinkles! It just makes the atmosphere feel magical!I appreciate that these are waterproof! It's been pretty hot out but we've had a few days of rain and these have gotten soaked daily due to being placed on a fence that surrounds my herb garden and these have held up as a good as new.A six hour charge is all it takes to keep these lights going strong for up to eight hours at night! As soon as it's dim enough out, these prominently come on. The solar panel needs to be facing the sun.  I was placing these indoors, I would keep the panel near a window to take all the sunbeams in to be fully charged. The solar panel can lay flat or be attached to a spike that easily can be pushed into the ground. These are very simple to set up and start using!I adore these lights and am looking into getting more to use for decorating our yard and inside our home. I highly recommend them! These are great for everyday, special occasion, and holiday use!  *I received these light in exchange for an honest review*

The Eltronica Lantern not only light the way but also directs your path! The compass that's built into the top is accurate and a neat feature to have included. The light stays hidden and off until you take hold of the handles and pull up. In pulling up you release the light to whatever desired amount you please. It is very bright so I like I can release as little or as much as I'd like!Batteries are not included. It takes three double A's to run. The battery holding area is located on the bottom of the lantern. No screw drivers are needed as the compartment can be open or closed simply by twisting. I like the size of the lantern as it's roughly the size of a can of soup! It takes up little space and that's very appreciated when having to pack for a camping trip or needing to store it some place at home.I consider this lantern a great asset to have on hand when camping or for home emergencies to provide adequate lighting!*I have received this product at discount to provide an honest review.*

The Quiseen BBQ Grill Mats work exceptionally well! Using these mats has taken my families grilling to another level and for that I am glad. We've cooked homemade burgers patties, vegetable, and number of other things atop of these over our charcoal grill. What's cooking has that freshly grilled taste and the mats even allow for grill marks!Clean up is quick. We don't have to scrub our grill as these non-stick grilling mats contain the mess. These come out as good as new whether washing by hand or throwing them in the dishwasher. I imagine with the thickness these have that they will last for a long time. I totally recommend them! These have made our grilling experiences and clean up that much better! *I have received this product at discount to provide an honest review.

The K'NEX Mighty Makers Up, Up and Away Building Set is pretty cool! I gave this set to my seven year old daughter and she got to work on it right away.  She spent a good portion of her Saturday making all three different aviation builds this set allows by herself. The builds include instructions and parts to make an airplane, glider, and a butterfly. My daughter even went so far as to create her own personalized flying contraption.She's not really into dolls but loves blocks and building so she was really thrilled to see a girl-themed set perfect for her age group! Compared to other sets out there she was able to lock the pieces together and take them apart without needing much additional help from my husband or I. She told me that the full color illustrated instructions were easy to follow.The pieces that challenged her the most were the arms and legs of the character. Once attached with moderate play, these tend to need re-attached which can cause a bit of frustration.Once put together the set can be played with without worry of anything coming apart or used as fun room decor.  I like that this set can be used as spring board to learn about mechanics and talk about engineering. It's not just fun to build but provides for a world of learning.Total props for this set being educational as well! My daughter was very proud of her accomplishments (I totally was too!) and is looking forward to collecting more in the Mighty Makers sets!

The Five Star Advance Spiral Notebook, 5 Subject, College Ruled in Green is a good choice to keeping organized whether using it for school, office, or another task where having dividers would be beneficial.I'm quite impressed with the durability and quality this notebook provides. The cover is a thick plastic which can easily be wiped off if needed. The binding is some sorta cloth that covers the binders rings. The binding gives this notebook a really polished look and feel.The spiral rings are covered which prevents unwanted snags to bags or injuries to oneself. There is a elastic tab on the front which one can store a pen or pencil so you'll never be without if ready to jot something down. The side of the binding has an area which one can label what the contents are within.Inside are 5 movable pocket dividers and 200 college ruled sheets that are perforated and feature three holes perfect for placing in a binder if needed! Each divider comes in a different color. The colors are gray,red, blue, green, and orange. The dividers feature pockets on both sides and a tab for quick reference and labeling. I like using a pencil when writing on the pockets so if I want to use them again I simply erase my writing and I'm good to go.The durability is top notch. I really feel that this notebook will last a lot longer than something like a binder would over the same amount of time. I'm finding it very useful aid in homing my teaching notes for a variety of subjects being taught in our homeschooling.

The Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends Transforming Batcave is awesome! My four year old son adores this set. The look on his face when I presented it to him was priceless. He's into the superheroes quite a bit and his ultimate favorite has always been Batman! This is his first Imaginext set and it certainly wont be his last.The features this set has are many. The transforming action goes from closing and opening batwings, ,transporting action figures up and down an elevator, light up bat eyes,  and jail that can be opened and closed easily! There are gadgets and armor which include an additional suit for Batman, projectile missiles that can be launched, a high-tech command center, and so on. When not being used, the armor is stored in a trunk that is sealed by a power pad which any figure can be placed on and then rotated for the trunk to pop open. All the gadgets (missiles, etc) have a place to be stored which prevents losing crucial pieces!There are two action figures included in this set which are Batman and the Joker. The set was pretty much ready to go upon arrival. All us parents had to do was free the toy from the packaging (which was quite easy to do). The set does have some light up action so I was pretty pleased also that we didn't have to purchase batteries separately.This set has provided for hours of imaginative play! I'm impressed the with durability. My son can be a bit rough on his toys so I'm happy to see that everything is holding up very well. I highly recommend this set!

The CARAT Fruit Basket with Banana Hanger is a great dual purpose kitchen item. What drew me right away was the fact that I could hang bananas and place other fruits and vegetables in the generous sized bottom bowl. The open areas helped seal the deal for me. The open design ensures the inner contents will last longer preventing bruises and allowing breathing for fresh produce.The attractive design and shiny chrome finish likely will fit into any kitchen color scheme. It looks great on my counter top and in the middle of kitchen table! It's easy to clean and hasn't scraped up any surface it's been upon.The durability is high. The hanger can hold a large number of bananas on the hook and still allow for many fruits to rest below. I would recommend having weight in the bottom of the bowl (i.e fruit or vegetables) when hanging bananas from the hook. The bowl can be somewhat unstable with bananas hanging from the top and and empty bowl below.Because my kids can see the fruit bowl sitting up on the counter or table, they've asked for fresh fruit more often than any other snack! It's been a great replacement for a large wooden bowl that fruit used to reside in. I guess for them it was out of sight, out of mind. This bowl has a been a huge space safer, has caused my kids to chose healthier choices for snacks, and has kept produce fresher longer. I highly recommend it!  *I received a sample of the product for review purposes.*

I'd been looking for a functional as well as an attractive kettle for some time and this one certainly fits the bill. The porcelain enamel is very attractive and the stainless steel trim adds that special something. I've found that the kettle has retained its vibrancy and shine after many uses.The base of the kettle fits perfectly on my small 6 inch plug-in burners.  My previous kettle held 2 quarts as well but it's base was suited for a larger burner. My oven only has one large burner but three 6 inch so having a smaller kettle base is quite preferred.The kettle features an easily removable lid for filling. I've found the lid to stay in place not shifting around even though it can be removed with very little effort. The kettle does whistle when water is boiling, it's not an overly ear piercing but much more subtle.  There's a heat-free silicone grip on the handle of the kettle that keeps it from slipping out of my hand while I am pouring. I also like the that the thumb lever on the kettle features the same heat reducing grip which helps to prevent accidental burns.This kettle is easy to pour and not make a mess. It has a bit of weight to it but of this I am glad. I don't have to fear the kettle getting knocked off the counter or stove easily.  Water stays warm for at least a half hour after boiled. I feel this kettle would be the perfect gift. It comes in a array of colors to suit any kitchen theme or personal style preference. I love mine!

The Creative Publishing International-Granny Squares Scarf Kit is one attractive and useful offering! It comes with a  32 page instructional book featuring  full color photos and illustrations, nine granny square patterns, one 4.00 mm crochet hook, a needle, and yarn in the colors of hot pink, vibrant green, rich blue, and deep purple.The kit comes in nicely sized box perfect for gifting! Everything needed to make a scarf is included. There are two suggested scarf patterns  which users can make or get creative and make a different array of granny squares and seam them together to make something even more original. Being very new to crochet myself, I found the instructions easy to follow. The step-by-step photos of certain techniques like the adjustable loop ensure a good start with likely no confusion in getting going. The helpful abbreviation guide and how to read the diagram symbol key is another addition I was happy to have included.I’m working on scarf right now after learning how to do the Whirlpool Granny Square! The yarn that comes in the kit it super soft and very easy to work with! I like that this is a great size to bring along to just about anywhere I might find myself. Overall, I’m quite happy with this kit and feel it would be a great choice for beginners or well advanced crochet artist! Who knew doing a square at time could be so much fun and could make so many amazing looking designs and accessories! *I received this kit in exchange for my honest thoughts on it *

Zwilling J.A. Henckels Ultra-Slim Nail Clipper do an excellent job. The construction and design of these clippers make it that they take up a  very minimal amount of space. Per following the illustrated instructions on the packaging my husband and I were able to figure out how to properly wield these for trimming finger and toenails. You simply slide the top part toward you to unlock it, then push that part all the way away from you, and then back toward you again to put the clippers into a cutting position. Closing the clippers is just as easy as opening them, once you get the hang of it.The cuts are clean and never rip, tear, or leave one with the need to file ones nails after. The storage pouch is black leather and the clippers stay snugly inside once placed. Since these are so slender, I've swapped out another pair of clippers in my purse and these took their place. These do what advertised, take up very little storage space, and appear to be quite durable. I certainly recommend for all nail trimming needs.

The Zillionz Talking Cash Register is a great choice for a teaching aid or prop for pretend play in helping children understand the importance of money and how it works. The unique features of this register such as the microphone, credit card sliding slot, and hand held scanner with sticker bar-codes to scan were huge hits with my 4 and 7 year old. The register includes play money and coins that mimic the size and value of real money. The drawer on the register opens and there are separate spots to  place the play money. The drawer makes a ding noise when opened. I did notice that the button will need to be pressed down with a bit more pressure to open as intended. I let my kids know that it tends to stick a bit and since realizing that there's been no issues with it.There are three languages English, French, and Spanish that the register can function in. This is great if teaching children a separate language! There is no volume control option but I found the sound to be at a comfortable level. The microphone works well and sounds just like one you would hear at the supermarket! When the register is not in use, there's an auto-off feature which saves batteries. This register requires 3 AA batteries which are included!There is a number pad on the register that functions just a like calculator. Children can scan bar codes and, add in their own prices to their total easily. I can see my family using this register for many years to come. It's a great way to teach about adding up purchases, making change, and so much more. This toy register is the closest to the real thing that I've seen on the market.I recommend it to children ages 4 and up mainly due to the lightweight plastic and feel of the product. I don't feel it would take a big spill or rough play very well.

The Alpine Blue Fairy Statue with Solar Light adds an extra special something to my herb garden.  The painted detail mimics the style you would likely find in an illustrated storybook filled with fantastical tales of mythical fantasy lands. The statue is made out of a cast stone resin which seems very durable. I keep it mainly outdoors and have had it get wet, withstand the hot and cold and still look like new.The solar lighting feature shines through three flowers on the rock the fairy rest upon. Each of the flowers  have a separate colored light of red, green, and blue. When it's dark out, the lights shine vibrantly likely not to be missed. The solar power panel is on the back and can be removed to change the one double A battery if needed with a small screw driver. If I need to turn the fairy off, there's a switch on the bottom of the statue. I like how the solar panel and switches are out of sight.In being a fairy fan myself, I feel most would favor this one. She's beautiful and adds charm to wherever she is placed. I feel she will be the first of many more additions!* I received this product free.*

The  25 oz FlavFusion (TM) Infuser Bottle by Big Easy Brands is one of the best infuser water bottles I've used!  It's durability is something to brag about being made out of Tritan Plastic. It can withstand being washed in the top wrack of the dishwasher use after use.  The bottle only has a few parts that are easy to keep together and keep clean, the base, a lid, infuser, and infuser cap.The bottle is completely BPA and Lead free. It's very light weight and easy to carry along with either with my hand gripped firmly around it or when using the hook on the lid to hold or hook onto a bag. It's slender design also fit great into the cup holder of our car.One of my favorite features is the locking lid. I simply turn the top lid to the right or left to keep it locked or unlocked.  The lid is a flip-top. I press a button on the front and it flips open. This prevents me from having to stop when walking, exercising, or whatever else just to un-twist a top to rehydrate. I've had zero issues with this bottle leaking or showing any other sort of wear.The infuser works great and I like the fact that you can use this bottle with or without by simply untwisting it from the inside. I've added cucumbers, blueberries, lemons, limes, mint, and more to create a number of delicious fruit infused water blends. For the best results I found letting the fruit, herbs, and vegetables sit in the water bottle in the fridge overnight delivered a far more intense flavor. Overnight setting isn't necessary, but important enough to mention.The flow of the water from the bottle with the infuser  is very natural, much like drinking from a cup. Since the fruit is confined to the basket, it allows for the water to flow around it preventing one from drinking pulp, seeds, fruit, or whatever else when taking a sip.I've been using this bottle for a couple of months and after seeing how well it's held up, highly recommend it! *I received this bottle for free to share my thoughts upon it*

Installing the Home-It Mop is simple. It comes with everything you'll need for general mounting, such as screws and drywall mounts.My husband put the rack on the desired area, made pencil marks where the holes were, then drilled holes for the mounts and hammered those in. He then put the rack back up and lined up the holes with the mounts and inserted the screws.There are no instructions, but there's nothing abnormal about the setup. If you've ever mounted something before, you'll likely have no problem. If you've never mounted on drywall before, and that's what you need to do, surely youTube will have a helpful tutorial.This is quite simple on the scale of install difficulty.The durability is noticeable and construction of this product was obviously well thought out. I've filled a few of the holding areas with household cleaning items of different sizes such as mop and brooms. The hanging hooks I've placed hand dusters and needed reusable bags upon and everything has stayed in placed.  My family likes this product and it's kept our home better organized.  We totally recommend it.*I received this in exchange for honest review.*

I received this to review and passed it along to my husband. Here's what he had to say about it: I've tried a few beards, and now also a various beard balms.Mr Rugged now ranks among the balms that have been upon my beard.This balm contains several oils, such as jojoba and ceder wood, as well seed butter and beeswax. It's easy to apply as it is soft but fairly firm.As one might gather from the ingredients, it is oily, so if you apply too much, your face will be oily. Following the directions should help. I just got carried away.When applied properly, it does soften the hair, as well as hydrate the skin. It's noticeable after using it only once.Got a beard? This is certainly an effective product to make it as good as it can be.

OZ Naturals Anti Aging - SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen is the best natural sunscreen I've used to date. It provides the protection needed from the rays of the sun without the use of any harmful chemicals.  It's made in the USA, never tested on animals, and 100% Vegan free. It contains  Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide known to give the ultimate protection against UVA and UVB rays preventing sunburn and damage.I like that I know what many of the ingredients and vitamins are that make up this sunscreen. The combination of of aloe, green tea, sweet almond, sunflower, cocoa butter, vitamin E, and so on smell wonderful! The scent is light and sweet. It's not what usually comes to mind when one thinks of sunscreen but I really like it!Application is directed to apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapplying after two hours or sooner if swimming, sweating, or towel drying. It went on fairly easily and didn't leave any undesirable white residue behind.  My skin wasn't left feeling greasy or looking shiny but feeling soft and moisturized instead. It doesn't feel heavy.  I was able to apply my mineral makeup right on top of this! My skin is fairly sensitive and I've had zero irritation.I work outside quite bit in my garden for a good bit of time each day and have found this SPF 30 sunscreen helps to prevent me from burning! Aside from protection it has anti-aging properties! I certainly recommend it. *I received a sample of the product for review purposes.*

Educational Insights Crazy Cereal is fast paced electronic game. Upon arrival, my son and daughter ages 7 and 4 were drawn to the cheerful illustrations covering the box. I have to applaud the box design. It mimics an actual cereal box quite well with nutritional information, a maze to do on the back, and so on. My children couldn't wait playing this game as it promised laughter and fun!Before play, a parent, teacher, or guardian will need to locate 2 AAA batteries and install one each into the game spoons per the instructions given. This step only takes a few minutes. A normal sized Phillips head screwdriver sufficed in the installation process. The batteries are solely needed for the LED color changing lights which match individual pieces of cereal. Each of the spoons has an auto-shut off mode which saves batteries and the sheer wonder if everything was turned off after game play.This two player game focuses on matching and color recognition skills. It's a fast paced and is usually is over in about five minutes. Whoever has the most pieces of cereal in their bowl at the end wins. There's a bit a variation to the game to keep things interesting. Skill is required in scooping up one piece of cereal and then two at a time into their own bowls with only using one hand. This game can help with sharpening motor skills and hand-eye coordination. It provides a challenge and also can be used as an aid to teach patience and good sportsmanship with others.Aside from playing the game as instructed, the game pieces can be used as an aid in teaching or pretend play. The cereal pieces designs are a circle loop, star, and a waffle type square. The colors of each are red, orange, yellow, green, and blue. The high quality pieces can be used to create patterns, practice motor skills without the speed of the game, and as math manipulatives.My son and daughter seemed to find this game fun. Their only disappointment was that it was over somewhat quickly. To expand game play we decided they would play three rounds. I had to remind them the first few times about the only picking up the cereal using the spoon and not their other hand. I really like that this game provides challenge. At the end of each round, I had the kids count the pieces they collected in their bowls. They were enjoying themselves so much that I bet they didn't realize they were learning and developing important skills too!  * In being an EI Insider I received a sample of the product for review purposes.*

The DII kitchen millennium microfiber dishtowels are amazing. I'm used to towels becoming soaked with minimal dish drying and leaving wetness behind but not with these. The towels are super soft and retain softness even after coming out of the wash. I washed these cold per instructions given and the towels look just as good as new when through the wash completely. I've often had towels of the same material pick up all sorts of lint  in the dryer and bleed onto other things but I didn't run into that issue with this set.The towel designs vary from light gray to much darker. The striped pattern is on one side of the towel and on the back it's completely white. The edges are all finely done and there's no sign of these coming apart very easily. On one of the corners is a tag that provides care instructions. I like that these towels can be multi-purpose. Aside from drying dishes, one could use these to polish stainless steel, wash windows, wipe down the car inside or out, bathroom cleaning, and so on. The quality and price made me jump at purchasing another set.  I may just invest in more to have colors for every season! I can't recommend these enough!

The perfect faucet at the right price.  Pfister does a wonderful job in standing behind their products as well as building quality products.  This was very easy to install and took me less than 30 minutes from opening the box to having it connected to the water lines and secured to the sink.  i had an issue with the stopped function but that was more related to our shape of sink and not so much the faucet.  Top notch and highly recommended!

Pretty neat concept but is a bit trickier in real life than on TV....Imagine that!  It needs 6 AA batteries to bring it to life to build the charge, so I suggest you use rechargeable batteries to get the job done.  You have to be careful at launching so as to not keep your face right over the unicorn as it takes flight.  It's magical in flight with a horn that lights up.  Easy to open packaging and easy to set up.  It does have a learning curve of around 20 minutes, but I do not recommend this outside in any type of wind.  It does need big open spaces when getting the hang of the unit.Overall, really nice toy with a small learning curve with the need for some AA batteries.  Depending upon the treatment of the toy will determine the outcome of how long it lasts.

High power charging in a smart portable powerhouse.  Six USB ports of intelligence to get you off an running.  Perfect for business travels, home charging of all your high energy demand electronics at a high rate of power.  This has saved the tons of portable small blocks that come with every power device in our house.  One simple plug and I now have 6 ports of smart technology at my fingertips.Smart circuit design with over-heated, over-current, over-charging protection. You battery in your electronic product will automatically stop when its full.  With up to 2.4 amps at each port, you can cast all your other slow, grocery store/mini mart purchases aside.  This one block of charging takes the place of all other needs.Highly recommended!

After watching the Blu-Ray DVD version of Ryan's trip to the Sacred Mountains i got the book.  I have to say the book is a must have to go along with the DVD.  Phenomenal detail of Human powered adventure mirrored with excellent writing and editing.  You take on Ryan's journey as he prepares mentally and physically to push himself through each trek, and you soak in the experiences with each step as if you were along side him on the same journey. The DVD consists of four episodes, each of a different mountain. They are 40-45 minute made-for-TV episodes, seamlessly put together giving us details of each trek before the adventure.I highly recommend the Blu-Ray DVD of his trek through China and state that you must accompany it with the book.  Not only did I enjoy both but my family as well.  The video was fantastic and goes hand in hand with the book.  I look forward to seeing more videos produced from Ryan Pyle productions!

I received this book after watching the Blu-Ray DVD version of Ryan's trip to the Sacred Mountains.  I have to say the book is a must have to go along with the DVD.  Phenomenal detail of Human powered adventure mirrored with excellent writing and editing.  You take on Ryan's journey as he prepares mentally and physically to push himself through each trek, and you soak in the experiences with each step as if you were along side him on the same journey.I highly recommend the book in addition to the Blu-Ray DVD of his trek through China.  Not only did I enjoy it but my family as well.  The video was fantastic and goes hand in hand with the book.  An excellent read and page turner.

When you need a hand up on hands off phone service in the car this is a nice system to use.  A little quirky on the setup and functions but overall a great way to connect your phone to your car.  Definitely need an AUX hookup to get hands free so it's a bit difficult without it and setup will not go well unless you go around behind the receiver to the AUX input.You do end up with a lot of wires but it solves a major hazard in your life.

Sent to the Demo man for my honest and valued opinion.Top notch thermos that keeps the hot drinks hot and the cold drinks super cold.  Double walled stainless steel is virtually indestructible with a sipping valve on top plus the perfect cup for pouring yourself a drink.  If anything the unit could be bigger to hold more beverages.  High quality and great for the road, I love the color and design.

Sweet ginger flavor gives you the perfect cup of tea, an excellent way to give you a delicious pickup for the day.  Students at the University love the subtle flavor and aroma.  Starts and finishes quite smoothly.
High quality seasoning perfect for baking, rubs and potpourri.  Phenomenal on hot Oatmeal.
Fantastic depth of flavor and color.  Great product to have in your cupboard.

One of the best faucets I've see on the market and one that was installed effortlessly by a professional handyman.  It has an awesome shine that cleans up well and goes with my stainless 5 burner cook top very well.  It arrived in good order with no issues and was well packaged and ready to install.  It came with the AC power pack but I needed the 6 AA pack since I didn't have an outlet under my sink.  The installation was pretty easy and straight forward and was done in little over 1 hour. The Pfister company does sell the battery pack option, but I purchased off Amazon and had it there in two days and plugged it in myself.The React Touch Free Technology feature works flawlessly and super fast, just a little too sensitive at times when in dimmer light or when you accidentally wave your hand in front while cleaning.  I suggest using the cleaning mode to turn off the sensor before cleaning.  My kids love it as much as I do simply because you can now avoid getting the faucet and handle dirty by turning it on and off.  Easy off and on for kids and you get to set the temperature so it cannot scald.  They like being able to hold a glass in front of the faucet to get some water instead of having to turn it on and off all the time.  If it's left on, it shuts itself off after 2 minutes.  Perfect!Good clearance in getting the unit filling iced tea pitchers and my icoffee water tank. The pull down sprayer with a pause feature is the perfect finishing touch with the Pforever Warranty covering finish and function for as long as you own your home.  How can you go wrong with such a unique system?  The perfect way to update your kitchen.  Highly recommended
No issues on download - perfect
Perfect fit at the best price

Arrived in good order, quality item that is charging 3 iPads and a galaxy 5 phone with no issue.  Perfect replacement for the higher endchargers.  No issues with plugging in and removing from outlets.

This is one heavy duty watch!  It's water resistant to 330 meters with 3 sub-dials for time specifics.  It arrived well package with a beautiful presentation box, squared away as if it was already setup as a gift.The white stitching on the band gives it a nautical look and really sets the watch apart from others on the market.  It is quite large but not to the point of being overly heavy on the arm.  It certainly sets a statement and is ready for action.  The perfect Christmas gift this holiday season!

Arrived well packaged with 3 bars to the case.  It offers a deeply rich chocolate flavor with great mouth feel.  Immediately broke a piece to make some home made hot chocolate and with some simple syrup, milk and the dark chocolate it made a fantastic cup of hot chocolate.  It also pairs well with a 19 Crimes wine that I have on hand as well as a nice Portugal port that I had around.  Very smooth in flavor and consistency and clean and delicious on the palette.  Very glad I tried this chocolate - outstanding quality!

Works like a charm with my iPhone 6.  App works to assist in programming, temperature taking as well as keying in on tracking of temperatures over the course of a day.  Since all my kids are older I had no issues with errors or resetting of the thermometer.Create a profile and assign a picture and you can have a database that's able to be taken to the doctors office if needed.  Highly portable and easy to use with the app.  Might be different with small children, but with a 9,10 and 13 yrd old its works quite well.
I ordered wide but they don't seem any bigger than normal size 12s
Excellent summery!  Very well done documentary

I've put together many office chairs from professional models to the standard chairs from Wal-Mart and Target.  I've always sat in the model before purchase and this is the first chair I've gotten without first trying it out.  I'm glad it was a demo model as it's highly uncomfortable to sit in and it has you leaning forward no matter how you adjust it.It did not arrive well packaged, in fact the box was pretty much destroyed and it fell apart getting it into the house. Part of the seat back was punctured during shipping but nothing worth fixing since the chair is not something I want to use.  Lucky everything was still inside the box.  Instructions were very easy to follow and the chair was put together in 20 minutes, but I tried adjusting it for an hour since it was so uncomfortable.The material feels good but over all the chair but it's stiff, clunky and seat back was not proportioned for my 6' 2" frame.  With it dipping forward and not being able to get a comfortable position its sitting off to the side, perhaps a Good Will run is in it's future, but I'd feel bad giving it them as well as it seems below anyone normal standards of a chair.Do not buy unless you can first sit in one at a local store!

As a professional chef I often am on the lookout for items that fit my extreme in cooking at home.  It was perfect when when I saw this pop up to demo and really glad I choose the item to utilize.  My wife and kids love the color combination and I love the versatility and durability including the stay cool handle.First and foremost I cooked off a pound of bacon at low heat, uncovered and had minimal splatter.  The pan was a snap to clean with a dry paper towel and then back on the gas burner to cook off some grilled cheese and bacon sandwiches.  A little butter on the bread and then two sandwiches at a time without turning up the flame.  There was even heating and browning and perfect melting of the cheese.The ceramic finish made for another quick cleanup with a sudsy sponge, and then hung on the pot rack for the next meal.  Perfect pan for the professional and home cook alike.  It's nice to have such quality in the kitchen.

Very durable, easy to use glove for the grill and oven.  Not too good for BBQ as the seasoning and such get stuck to the glove.  Works as expected for extreme temperatures.  Perfect for use with cookies pans, sheets pans and hot items on a grill.

High quality cleaner that floats to the top when released.  Easy access to spinning when in the water and perfect for our 20 gallon fish tank.  Cannot go wrong with this purchase.  My kids have even dropped it an it's survived hit hard flooring without damage.  Great price and excellent product!

Perfect audio flash drive.  Recorded voices from 6 feet away with clarity and loaded right up on my MAC as audio files without having to download a ton of software.  The audio capabilities mirrored with the flash drive access make this the perfect portable drive.  A simply on and off switch makes runnign the unit very easy.

Right out of the box this little power house was able to fully charge my iPhone 5 and my wife's Galaxy 5 in the car while we were both using them.  I was using mine for Waze directions and my wife was playing a game.  Both phones took a charge and kept charging while in use, fully chragin them both while being used.  Not many power adapter chargers on the market can stand behind that statement.It was easy to plug into the powerport/lighter and with the addition of my lightening cable I was up and running in seconds.  Good build quality and superior charging is a must with these units and Anker has given both!  Simply outstanding!

This is a perfect little HEPA unit for medium sized rooms.  It's ready to go in a matter minutes right out of the box, and replacement filters are easily found on Amazon or other online locations as needed.  It's an economical solution to many breathing problems, and while my family does not have many issues, it does help with pet dander and allergens that are floating in the air to help eliminate breathing issues when cleaning.  It gives a fresh clean smell to the main family living space with little noise.  I'd say from low to high it goes from the sound of our dishwasher to that off a small box fan, which is not that bad for the size and volume of air moved through the unit.Even as a demo, I'd purchase another if needed based upon the quality, design and economics of filter replacement.  Top notch HEPA filter.

Wow - Perfect size and loaded with Chicken Jerky.Almost looks good enough for human consumption, but I saved it for my Doxie who loves it as a special treat.  Perfect size for an occasional snack and it's a clean snack, without processed ingredients.  High quality, and perfect for your companion and it doesn't stain the carpet when eaten.

All I buy for my iwhatevers is Otterbox, from my iPhone 5, to my iPad Air and iPad 3.  The quality is consistent, and the build is spot on.  The silicone case is easy to get on and off and works quite well in giving access to all the buttons and ports.  It's instruction-less concept and design is very intuitive and easy to assemble around the iPad. Touch ID works well and screen protector is integrated with the case and not a separate application so you don't have to press and wiggle to get the bubbles out.Perfect for my kitchen duties and harsh environmental conditions.

The TSST Battery Charger arrived charged with a 30-inch long high-quality USB cord. Sadly it does not come with a case to protect the unit or charger to plug into the wall for self charging.  A cool feature is that it has two USB ports and can charge two devices at the same time, one at 2.4A and the other at 1A.A full recharge of the battery charger took about 6-7 hours using a iPhone 5 wall charger.  It performs well and weighs a little more than my iPhone 5.  In comparison to other models its holds a decent charge.  Good quality unit and a great price!

This is a fast paced light read.  Something for a car ride or sitting on the porch passing time.  Gemma is a neat character but her best intentions never turn out quite right.  Enjoyable and easy to read with a fun story line.  Enjoy the time!

UGh.  I have skinny legs so I thought I'd be okay with the large - which fits EVERYWHERE else - but nope.  Could barely get the crotch snapped and even when I did, the snaps popped open almost immediately.  I've been trying to make some alterations on it and am regretting it because it's so much more complicated than it should be and now I can't return it... even if I do get it to the point where the crotch doesn't pop open when I move, I'm not sure that it will look good.  I might just have a hanging crotch.  Ick.It's really annoying that it fits me perfectly except the leg holes - seriously, I don't even want to think about how skinny someone's legs must have to be to fit into this thing.  Although, maybe it's not the legs, maybe if I had a little less booty that would help too, but either way, the fact that the elastic still can't stretch enough to wear this comfortably and without the crotch unsnapping is pretty disappointing.  It's elastic.  IT's supposed to stretch, but it fails.

Reading The Para-Portage of Emily made me feel like I was reading Jane Austen or one of the Bronte sisters, if they had written erotic romances.  Wilson's descriptive prose paints a scene like an artist paints a landscape.  The story itself is hauntingly beautiful, interspersed with passionate erotic scenes that are done in a very romantic style with lots of description and emotion imbuing each one.  I couldn't help but feel a little sad while reading the story, because there is quite a bit of sadness as Emily learns about the tragically romantic past of the house she's currently residing in, but at the same time there's a thread of hope as well.  There's also a mystery to be solved and little hints scatter the story, like breadcrumbs, until it all comes together in the end.While I found the story to be a bit sadder than I usually enjoy, I couldn't tear myself away from the beautiful writing, my curiosity over what kind of ending could be coming, and my desire to know exactly what was going on.  There's ghosts - or maybe just shadows of the past - and all sorts of possibilities.  Mostly, there's a sense of love that never dies, passion that never fades, and patience that never ends, until the reward finally comes.  I'm very happy this is a series, although I wouldn't say the book ends on a cliff-hanger, but I can't wait to see where it goes from here.If you want a completely different kind of ghostly romance, and especially if you love histories and love that crosses all barriers of time, space and death, this is definitely a book you won't want to miss.  It's unlike anything I've ever read, in a very good way.

This product is just bad.  I bought it to be part of a costume, while also being functional as a purse, and it's completely unusable, as a costume prop or as a purse.It's poorly and cheaply made and looks nothing like the picture. Strangely, it does come with four machine gun purses instead of one. I assume that's why the price is so high.
