And later, as the goddesses dueled, racing polished wood sleds down the slippery snow and then grass slopes, Pele loses.Enraged, Pele flings fire:  "From down below, Pele threw spears of red-hot lava that melted snow and ice.  The edges of Poli'ahu's white cloak began to burn up.  She could feel the fire at her heels."Each page has a fully colored illustration by masterful artist Kathleen Peterson.  The oranges, reds, and blacks of Pele's cloak are contrasted with the blues and whites of Poli'ahu's cloak, both set against a the burning lava landscapes and the purple-blue-turquoise oceans of Hawaii.  The graphics and layout are stunning; one could frame every page as a work of art.Strife between brothers, contention between sisters are stories striking deep,  almost universal roots.  Young readers who have seen the movie "Frozen" may immediately recognize Poli'ahu's and Pele's powers, through fiery Pele and cool Poli'ahu play different roles here. This exquisite book entertains, teaches, and may ignite wonderful questions about volcanoes, glaciers and the forces that shape our world as well as about relationships.ANY READER ALERTS?  None.  A new copy of this book is fine value.  At used book prices, "Pele and Poli'ahu" is a bargain in quality binding, printing, & color reproduction in addition to the story itself.Highly, very highly recommended.  The copy I recently bought is a gift for a three-year old visitor who is enchanted with Hawaii's fire and ice. I think she will love it!

Easy to unfold the tool I want & easy to snap it back in place4.  Sturdy enough for basic repairs & adjustments although might not handle heavier work5.  Low price for what I need and saves me money in buying yet another wrench because I've mislaid that sizeReasons This Might NOT Be the Tool for You1.  You frequently use tools not included here & a bigger array with those tools included would work better for you2  You need stronger, heavier tools for larger bike jobsFor basic bike needs, this is affordable, sturdy enough & by a reputable maker.  For other bikers, a few additional dollars may better match your sizes, needs, and current array of tools.  This could be a thoughtful gift for someone relatively new to biking or even for use around the house.

I haven't been using this long enough to say that my lashes are as thick and long as I dream they will be, but I've been using it long enough to say that they are thickening up after just a few uses.  I have thin, short eyelashes and I've always dreamed of extensions but I don't think I need to even consider that after using this product.  I play to continue to use this consistently and I'm sure I'll have the results I want based on the use of this so far. These nail brushes include everything needed to do a self at home manicure using nail art.  The pouch is silver, glittery and appears to be well made with the logo on the front. Each brush has an individual plastic cover as well which I'm keeping on them. I'm sorry to say that I had a lot of issues with this cat bed and it broke on first use.  I did try to contact the seller on a couple of different occasions but I never heard back from them.  Issues the short version, the area to slide poles was too tight and when I finally did get them in, the material was raveled. It looked a hot mess. I thought that would be the first area it would break but it wasn't. I had to assemble the last poled in that tight area and I had to hammer one side because it wouldn't fit at all. It made the whole thing crooked. One end wouldn't even come together to fold over onto the velcro right. And lastly, when I put Chelsea on the bed, the metal holding the bed to the window snapped and she fell landing on my tripod. The metal wasn't even even, so I had to adjust the suctions to try to make it a little bit even to put my cat on it. She wasn't injured enough to take her to the vet but she was sore. I do think that with some modifications this would be a great product but as it is, I can't recommend it :(. It could just be that I got a defected cat bed.  The good news is the suctions cups are great.  Even after the bed broke, those suckers stayed put on my window.

This smells so good, I use it in all of my washing.  I was a little weary that it wouldn't dissolve while washing but it has each and every time.  My clothes smell amazing after washing. I don't smell this as much after drying as I do before.  I will continue to use these for a scent booster in my clothes.

These are so cute and look so stylish with my gypsy shower curtain.  They were easy to use and install and so far so good, they are as bright and shiny as they were when I opened the package. Works perfectly as expected.  I haven't had any problems with this kit to date.  I received this for a promo to pair with a hammock.  I wanted to put the hammock indoors during rainy days, to read and relax it.  This kit pairs well with the hammock.

This collar does have some kinks to work out in regards to working when it should.  Some days it works perfectly and some days, not so much. For a larger dog I think it would work great.  I received this collar for review purposes and if I had a larger dog than one that weighs 2 lbs. I would definitely buy it again. This is absolutely adorable, unfortunately the size runs small and my little dog can't wear this. Have you ever used a dog shampoo that made your dog end up smelling like a "wet dog" while washing him or her?  Well, this isn't one of those shampoos.  This shampoo arrived today and because Peanut has wallowed around in something smelly, I washed him with it immediately. Not only was it pleasantly scented, he didn't smell like a wet dog at all from start to finish. I've always loved the fresh coffee house flavor I get when I use a good french coffee press.  I drink my coffee stronger than the normal person would so I use 1/4 cup of fresh ground coffee beans and I fill it up about 3/4 of the way with hot boiling water.  I leave it to sit for about 5 minutes.  After it has sat for the allotted time, I push the plunger down slowly until I can't push it down any further and I then pour and drink. Although I've owned many french coffee press's, I can't recall one that was as well made as this one is.  My coffee and tea stays hot until gone, which is usually within a couple of hours.  I drink coffee all morning and tea all afternoon.  I use the same amount of loose tea as I do coffee but as with both coffee and tea, if you like yours milder, I'd start with a tablespoon per 8 to 10 ounces of boiling water and work your way up until you find your perfect cup.  This french coffee press is easy to keep clean.  As soon as I drink my last cup of either coffee or tea, I soak it and then wash it as usual.  I've yet to fix a nice fresh cup of coffee with this french press, that did not taste absolutely delicious.  Coffee house flavor right at home, I can't beat that.  I received this french press for review purposes but even if I'd of paid full price, I'd highly recommend this french coffee press.  If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.

I've been wanting to try this shea butter after reading all of the reviews and seeing just how many wonderful ways I could use this shea butter.  I live in a dry climate and as I get older, my skin is drying out to the point that normal moisturizers do not help any more.I make a lot of my own body scrubs, lip scrubs, etc so I had planned to make my shea butter into something wonderful but after it arrived I was pleasantly surprised that the smell wasn't anything like I had expected.  I thought I'd  have to add essential oils and maybe some almond oil which I use in everything but that isn't the case.  This shea butter is amazing as is.  I add it directly to my dry skin from the block of shea butter I received.  My skin is soaking it in and I'm super pleased with the results I've been getting so far. I can't wait to see how well it does on my skin during the winter months when my skin most needs the most nourishing results.  My skin has not looked this healthy in a long time.  I received this shea butter for free or at a steep discount to review.

My grand daughter wore this outfit every time I'd let her get away with it.  She was born a picky dresser and this was her favorite cute and comfy outfit.  I bought it for her after letting her pick it out, and it was one of my prized purchases because I don't think anything I've ever bought received more use than this darling outfit did. It held up even with all of the washing in between wear and I was sad to see it handed down to a relative when she no longer could wear it.  Not as sad as she was :).  The fit was a true fit, I didn't have to swap it for a smaller or larger size.  It was perfectly fitted on little  Abby.  I would definitely buy from this seller again and not think twice about it. Quality merchandise at a great price. Note her expression in the photo when I told her she couldn't wear her outfit to bed, lol.

I'm not sure exactly what makes the patches work but they do.  I was provided with a sample for review and I've not stopped cleaning since wearing these.  I've cleaned everything from my pantry to cupboards to my closets.  I've almost finished every area in my home.  I wasn't really expecting much from these patches as I've purchased every kind of energy product I could find because I feel drained all of the time.  I live with chronic pain and I'm lucky if I get 3 hours of sleep at night.  Some days, it's an effort just to get up and go brush my teeth.  Being able to have the energy to complete tasks that I haven't been able to since my failed back surgery, feels a little bit like I've got a new life.  Because I'm able to accomplish more during the day, I'm even sleeping better at night.  The patches are small enough that I can hide them in hairless areas while I'm wearing them and they come off really easily.  They DON'T make me jittery or keep me awake.  I will continue to use these on a regular basis especially through out the winter when my pain is at it's worst and when I really need to be getting up and moving around.

I bought this to use for travel and I was not disappointed.  With a different climate I looked for something a bit of a stronger hold than I'd wear for every day use.  This is a fantastic spray and it held my hair in the different climates I traveled in. Being able to wear this in all humid weather conditions has made this my #1 choice.  I'll continue to use this as it doesn't make my hair look stiff like I was afraid it would.

I bought this to wear around the house and I wear an xs size in robes.  The robe was entirely too small and the only person it does fit is my 7 year old grand daughter.  I'm glad someone was able to get use out of it but I was wanting a thin robe for myself as she has quite a few of them.  I'd buy this 2 or 3 sizes bigger than what you'd wear if I was you.  Another thing I didn't like about it is that there was only one belt loop which was strange.

I bought this app for one of the grands because she wanted to try it.  She's still playing it and brings her device with her when she comes over to keep trying to get me to play it as well.  When I asked her what rating to give this she told me a 10.  I can't do that so I'll give it a 5 star rating based on her high recommendation. The grand kids know more about these apps /games than I do.

My sister bought a fruit infuser so I wanted to try one for myself.  I got this one at a steep discount and I thought, why not.  I have been pleased with the performance of it and I've actually been drinking more water because of this fruit infuser. I've been checking through different recipes this week and I plan to try all of them over the course of the winter.  It's a good thing this infuser is shatter proof because the grands were fighting over holding it and it got dropped.  It didn't shatter thank goodness because I hadn't used it even once at the time they were checking it out.  We all love the fruit flavored water it produces and I guess I need to buy all of the grands one of these too so they won't fight over mine.  It would be a great way to get them to drink water over sodas.

My grandkids downloaded this app on my Kindle Fire HDX and play it every time they come over. It was free to download and I like free.  On rainy and cold days, they take turns playing this and my only complaint is that they don't want to share because apparently it's a fun little app.  I need to buy more tablets to download this on all of them.

At 53 years old, I got my first ringworm ever.  It itched me silly so I got on Google to see what I could use otc and that's how I decided on this product.  Within no time, my ringworm was gone and I have plenty of the cream leftover in case I get any more.  This is a generous tube and I didn't realize I would receive enough to get rid of more than one ringworm.  I'm ringworm free after applying this twice a day.  I continued to apply it after the itching stopped as recommended.

I have almost no closet space in my studio apartment.  I have more clothes than space.  I bought quite a few of these to try to solve that problem and they work well for what I needed them for.  I'm using wire hangers with them so I'm able to put 2 hangers in each slot.  When I want to remove or add an item, I hook both ends on my closet rod.  I then hang these with one clip and it saves so much space.  I wasn't sure if these would be strong enough to hang my winter jackets on but so far so good.  They are stronger than I thought they'd be.

I've been buying Sparkle paper towels every since I ordered some the first time.  These big rolls/8 pack last for a month and does what it's suppose to.  I can pick up spills, wash up messes, clean my glass and even wash up areas off my floor with these.  They are strong which was a nice surprise and the affordability is why I keep buying them.

I buy this toilet paper in bulk from this seller because it's my favorite brand and this seller is affordable enough that I can purchase it in bulk amounts.  I'm disabled so it's not convenient or easy for me to go shopping.  Being able to buy tp for a month at a time and to have it delivered right to my door is a blessing.  The toilet paper is strong and cleans doing what it was made to do.

I bought two of these for my living room and I'm going to buy some more for other areas in my apartment.  I lack electrical outlets in my small home and the only way I can plug in everything I need to is with these.  They seem to work well, I've got 4 plugs in each one but I wanted to get 6 outlet taps in case I need to plug in something else in these areas in the future.

This brand seems to work well with all of my baked goodies, from cookies to biscuits, it keeps the bottoms from getting too dark which usually happens when I over bake.  The width is great to use with my larger baking pans and the sharp cutting blade is fantastic. I received this product at a discount for review purposes.

I'm all about the retro!  I have been looking for some unique canisters to go in my retro/boho/industrial apartment and when I saw these, I knew I'd found what I've been looking for.  I got these canisters at a reduced price and I couldn't wait to see how they look in person vs the photos I've seen of these.  I have a very limited amount of counter space so most canisters wouldn't work all lined up together but this set is perfect for the location they now live.  They are colorful and heavier than I expected.  I guess I wasn't expecting these to be made of glass and I'm really glad they are because they will be easier to keep clean in my opinion.  They are made with heavy duty glass at that.  It'll take a lot  to break one of these. I wanted canisters to hold items that are not the norm for canisters but it's things I used all through out the day and I knew it would make it easier to keep these in the retro canisters.  Freshness matters. I use one for my unGodly amount of 800 mg Motrin I take on a daily basis for chronic pain from failed back surgery.  I use one for cat and dog treats.  Every time we go out and come back in, they get a treat.  The other one I am using is for my Scentsy wax tarts.  I go through several a day and cutting them open and putting them in the canister saves my aching hands from trying to open the packages all day long.  This product deserves a 5 star rating.  All opinions expressed are my own despite the reduced cost I paid for this set.

This is a great little tea set for all tea enthusiasts like myself.  I received this tea set recently and it has become my favorite tea set because it's affordable even at full price. This tea set would make a great holiday gift idea for anyone on your shopping list.  I haven't managed to crack the bone china cups and tea post which is a miracle for this clumsy Georgia peach.  It's sturdy and practical as well as stylish and just plain fun to show off.  The carrying handles on the bamboo tray are a nice touch for someone like me who is clumsy beyond anyone I know.  The grooves in the bamboo tray keep the cups and tea pot from moving when I'm carrying the tray.  I love that the bamboo lid on the coffee pot stays in place while I'm pouring the tea because I've had lids fall off and break while pouring and have even had some hot tea come out and burn my hand while pouring.  Again, refer back to "clumsy me".  I can't think of any reason NOT to purchase this cute and sexy, yep, it's sexy, tea set. I received this item for free or at a steep discount for review purposes.

I don't really have anything more to add that other reviewers hasn't added already on these great pair of tweezers.  I bought these tweezers at a discount and after arriving for review purposes, I put them to work.  I am thrilled I finally have a pair of tweezers that I consider to be a great quality tweezer and that it has it's own carrying case that I can store it in, in my makeup caboodle.  And just look at the pink.  If that don't make you feel special and girlie, I don't know what will.The point is my favorite feature on these or I guess I should say the tip is.  It closes together perfectly and hairs or splinters come out on each and every try.

My front door gets opened and shut all day long.  Seriously.  I am disabled due to failed back surgery so I order from Amazon almost daily for all of my household products and anything else I need that I prefer to have delivered to my door vs. the pain of trying to push a buggy around.  So, between Fed Ex, UPS, grand kids and other family members, a mini chacha that goes out all day, my door is opened a lot every day as stated.  It's not unusual for flies and other creepy crawlies to get in when we are going out.  It happens.  I decided I wanted to try this pest repeller for that reason.  Another reason I wanted to try it because it's recyclable.I plugged it in as soon as it arrived, right at my front door behind a bookshelf.  To date I haven't had any flies get in.  I did see a spider on the day I plugged it in but haven't since so I don't know if it moved out or is staying hidden.  I'm not sure this even works on keeping spiders out but I hope so.  I have never seen any sign of rodents in my  home but with cold weather headed our way, it's possible that one or more might try to find a warm home to wait out the weather in.  After seeing how this keeps out bugs, I'm confident that it's going to deter rodents from selecting to move in to my home.I received this product at a discount for review purposes but based on it's performance to date, it's definitely worth paying full price for.

These are the cutest little door stoppers I've seen.  My mom always used a black cast iron antique iron to hold open her pesky door that never stayed open without it and I always wondered why she didn't get something cute to hold it open with that didn't take up so much space.  I used to trip over that iron all the time.  Now that I have a pesky door that won't stay open without a door stopper, I wanted a cute alternative to hold my door.  Something that didn't take up an unreasonable amount of space.  I came across these door stoppers and was lucky enough to get them at a reduced cost so I thought, why not.  They are cute enough to be used year round and they are SMALL enough that no one will trip over them.  For the price, I am really surprised by the quality of the door stoppers.  They truly are heavy duty and that's  what I needed.  With grand-kids in and out of my room, a cat and a dog, I'm thrilled that it's small enough that it doesn't cause any trips or falls and the added leather holder is great as well when I want to pull it out from under my door.  I've since added a door stopper in the bathroom as well and I'm super pleased with these nifty little door stoppers.Worth the price.  A multipack for more than one problem doors.  Small but durable.

I have had the worst dry skin this year and I have been looking for a good moisturizer for my face.  This product intrigued me due to the bee venom so I decided to give it a try. I feel a little tingly when I apply this on my face but I've not had any kind of negative reaction from this.  I let my BFF try some and she fell in love with it as I did.  My face does not feel oily after use,  after applying it, I let it soak in about 2 minutes before applying my foundation. I received this product at a discount but it's definitely worth buying at full cost and I will continue to use this.  My face feels younger and I'm hoping after continued use it will continue to improve the dryness.  I'm sure it will help me combat winter dryness.

This is really the neatest little thing ever.  I have to keep my weight down due to back injuries and it's not always easy for me to do that.  I still have 8 lbs to lose from last winter and this year's winter months will soon be on us.  I knew I had to get serious about losing the weight because the increase in pain becomes unbearable.  I have been using this portion control plate to keep my portions at a minimum (I love to cook and eat) and I lost another pound and a  half just from minimizing my portions.  I backed off of seconds and am using this plate to help me shed the pounds before winter is upon us.  The cold makes my pain worse so I'm not as active.  I'm going to use this portion control plate through the winter so I don't have to worry about extra pounds next year.  It appears to be made really well and I'm satisfied with my purchase that I got at a steep discount for review.

I have really back back pain due to failed back surgery so I decided to try this cream while I had a chance to purchase it at a discount.  I have been on vacation and I knew that my back pain would increase during that time from traveling and moving around more than I normally do.  The  main area where my pain is, is in my lower back where they reconstructed it, and in my left SI joint.  The joint is the worst pain of the two areas so that's what I've been using this cream on.  I was able to keep up with everyone in ways I don't think I would have been able to before, and I continue to use it now that I'm back from vacation.  I purchased new clothes for my vacation and I was worried about it staining them but after reading that it  does not stain clothes, I tried it and am happy to say that NOTHING is stained in the line of clothes. I didn't smell like medicine which usually is the outcome when I try pain creams, and I'm 100% satisfied.

I got a kitten over the summer who seemed to grow overnight.  I had originally bought a litter box with a half side but she started getting litter everywhere with her digging.  I made the wise decision to purchase this jumbo hooded litter pan and it really was a great decision.  The size is really a bonus especially with my extremely large long haired cat.  I don't have to scrub the floor every day now since getting buying this litter pan so I'm a happy pet owner once again.

These are the biggest wine glasses that I now own and the most beautiful.  I love to sit outdoors sipping on my wine when we grill out and now that is an even more enjoyable event with these beautiful glasses.  They hold so much and are really well made.  Having a matching pair of them is a bonus.  They are absolutely gorgeous.  I bought these glasses at a discount price to review.

This turned out to be the perfect mosquito repellent for me because I hate wearing spray products that stink in my opinion.  I now wear my bracelet when I'm outdoors in the evening and I don't have to worry pesky biting mosquitoes.  My grand daughter wears it when she is here because she is here so it's great for children as well as adults.  I bought this at a steep discount for review purposes.

The kids and I have had a lot of fun trying to decide what to use this craft tape with.  I didn't expect it to be so well made and of course it works great.  I originally bought this (at a steep discount) to use on my mini blinds in my boho bedroom.  Unfortunately, I could not remove all of the dust particles on the blonds so I couldn't use it for that. I kept back two rolls for the new blinds I plan to buy.  I'm extremely clean, however, I live in an old country store turned apartment and dust falls from the ceiling daily.  My ceilings are so high that I can't reach them to clean them daily. It's such an ordeal to drag my ladder out to clean them so I only do it 4 - 6 times a year.  I hate dust :).  With my project put on hold, I handed each of the kids a roll and asked them to get creative and they did.  They are still using the tape for new projects because there is a lot on each roll.

I bought this laptop sleeve for one of my Lenovo 15.6 laptops because I was going on a trip and it was so much prettier when it arrived than the photos show.  I was a bit disappointed that my laptop brand is made larger than the laptop sleeve but after I sent it in, the company gave me back my full purchase price.  They were wonderful to work with and if I can find one of these to fit my laptops (I have two of the same brand and size), I'll definitely purchase from this company.

This is a wonderful eye cream and although I haven't used it long enough to get the full results I want from this cream, I have been using it long enough to say that I've already started noticing an improvement in my eye area.  I don't have dark circles around my eyes but my BFF does and I let her use it while I was visiting for the week and in one weeks time there was an improvement in her dark circles.  I'm using it for tiny annoying wrinkles and I'm thrilled to be seeing an improvement with the wrinkles.  I'm going to continue using this because when I find something that works, I stick with it.  I bought this eye cream at a steep discount but it's worth the full price.

This has turned out to be a really great flat iron which I received for review purposes from the company.  It works really well and doesn't take long to heat up at all.  The nice long cord is great because I don't have a plug in where my big mirror is that I use to style my hair and put on my makeup.  I haven't used this ceramic iron to straighten my hair but my daughter did and it looked so good.  I use it to add curls to my hair (beach waves) and it works wonderfully for what I wanted it for.  It's slim and easy to hold and I don't have to worry about my hands getting sweaty and it slipping.

I bought this mirror to take on a vacation and it turned out to be a good investment.  I was afraid it would break en route but that didn't happen and I continue to use it now that we are back from vaca.  It's small enough that I can keep in on my tiny counter in my tiny bathroom.  I love the magnification and the nickel finish.  It's stylish and useful.

I decided to get this hat which I received at a steep discount for the kids to play dress up.  We are going to  use it for Halloween as well but the grands love dressing up all year long and anytime I find something  cool, I get it for them.  I like to encourage imaginative play.  The hat is made a lot better than I expected it to be which was a pleasant surprise as that means it will continue to be a fun item for the kids for a long time.

I've been buying this brand of paper towels from Amazon for a couple of years now and I've been pleased with it's performance.  Bounty has always done the job it was intended to and I'm sure I'll continue to purchase this for years to come.

This is one of the best kitty litter purchase choices I've made regarding my cat.  I don't have to deal with kitty odor and it's easy to clean out the litter with a scoop with this kitty litter.  I tired a fine sand like litter before this one and I had it all over because it clung to my cat.  I'll continue to use this cat litter and I'm thrilled that I can buy it on amazon so it can be delivered to my door.

It's been a long time since I could find these moon boots.  I used to wear them when I was pregnant because they were so comfortable, I could wear them all day even with my feet swelling.  When I was surfing around looking for slippers I came across this product and made my purchase.  I've been wearing them around the house and even to go check my mail at the post office, a block over.  They are comfortable while providing a sole so it's the next best thing to being barefoot but with protection.  I wanted to make sure these were the same ones I used to buy when I was pregnant, and they are so I'll be making more purchases of them.

I can't believe the bargain I got with this gown.  I had back surgery some years back which failed so I'm left with chronic back pain for life.  I wanted a gown that was loose, lightweight and comfortable not just for sleepwear but for lounging around the house as well.  When I'm trying to sleep and a gown wrinkles or bunches up, it's really painful and it takes me forever to pull all of the wrinkles out to try to sleep.  This gown is the perfect weight so it does not get the big wrinkles I try to avoid with gowns.  I do plan to buy more of these gowns while they are such a deal on the price.  The blues in the gown makes me feel peaceful and restful as well as giving it a cute look.

I first bought one of these bras at Walmart because they are wire free and I wanted to try to find a comfortable bra.  I've been searching for a comfortable bra since puberty hit.  After buying and wearing the bra, I knew I had finally found the one bra that I could wear day or night and never realize I had one on. I recently bought a few on Amazon including this one, because I'm trying to purchase one of every color.  I've been buying the bras when I find a good deal on them which I got in this one,  and plan to continue buying.  I weigh 120 lbs and have a medium size chest.  The medium is perfect for my size and honestly it's the best bra in the world, in my opinion.

I can't believe the bargain I got with this gown.  I had back surgery some years back which failed so I'm left with chronic back pain for life.  I wanted a gown that was loose, lightweight and comfortable not just for sleepwear but for lounging around the house as well.  When I'm trying to sleep and a gown wrinkles or bunches up, it's really painful and it takes me forever to pull all of the wrinkles out to try to sleep.  This gown is the perfect weight so it does not get the big wrinkles I try to avoid with gowns.  I do plan to buy more of these gowns while they are such a deal on the price.  The pink in these makes me feel young while providing the comfort I needed as a not so young woman.

I bought these skates for my grand daughters and they have really gotten a lot of use out of them this summer. The skates roll really well on most surfaces, but especially the sidewalk and indoors on rainy days.  The brake is easy for them to use which is located on the front of each skate.  The shoe size is a true fit of what I wanted.  The skates lace up and have a Velcro strap to help keep the skates on. I feel like I've gotten my money's worth and more with the skates as they've given the kids hours of fun and exercise.

I got this book for my granddaughters Kindle.  We read it together before nap time every day.  Every. Single. Day.  This is one of her favorite books and now that she's learning to read, I've let her read parts of it back to me.  It's a cute book of short stories, jokes and games.

These songs take me back.  I haven't heard some of these in a long, like "Against all Odds" and  "Wonderful Tonight".  I have the playlist of Love Songs on my Kindle Fire HDX and when we are having a gathering or party, I connect my Kindle and Bluetooth speaker and we rock out with songs of days gone by.

This is a pretty decent little LED lantern for the size.  I wasn't sure it would provide enough light I wanted it too until it arrived and I put it to the test.  I can change the light settings from dim to the highest setting which allows me to go outdoors at night and not have to worry about falling or tripping on anything.  The main reason I wanted this lantern was for when our electricity goes out.  After several recent storms that knocked out power out, I wasn't going to be left in the dark again.I do believe this is worth the price for the money.  I received this lantern at a discount or for free and decided to provide my honest unbiased review.

Finally a product that helps with those little feet marks I always found on the back of my seats. Found as in past tense as I now have the mats and I no longer have my car.  I was in a MVA 2 weeks ago and my car was totaled. For whatever reason I didn't put these in my car the day they arrived which happened to be the same day I was in m accident.  Just lucky I guess.  I have to say that for the price I did not expect them to be this quality made but it was a great surprise.  Not only that but they are so easy to keep clean. I keep stuff for the kids in the pockets but I don't put their tablets in them because I don't want to take a chance on them kicking the back of the seat and cracking their screens.  I don't know how well the organizer would protect breakable objects and I don't want to take that chance.  They are perfect for keeping wipes, books, toys and other items which are always needed when we are in our automobile. I have been using these in my daughters car when I shuffle the grands around but take them out afterwards.  I received the mats at a steep discount and I'm not sharing them :).  She'll have to get her own pair.PS Cat not included ;)

0:55 Mins Allen wanted to try this collar with his labs because he wants to train them for hunting and obedience purposes. The video shows how well the training is going after one week of use.  In the video he is showing the use with one of the two labs that he has, the younger of the two & a little bit more stubborn than mama bear.  Everything was included in the package and after opening it, reading the instructions and putting the collar on, he adjusted the fit and then he was ready to start training.  The training is going so well that all of his hunting buddies have been equally as impressed with it.  He's had to show how it works quite a few times since receiving this (he loves showing it off) and I do believe he's made a believer out of his buds as it's made him.  There are several different methods of getting his dogs attention as you might have read in the description of the collar.  You can select beeps, vibrations or shocks although we prefer the beeps and vibrations which are enough to get the dogs attention. I received this collar at a discount or for free and decided to provide my honest unbiased review.  I'm giving it a 5/5 star rating because of the amazing results Allen is getting.

I am SO happy with this robe.  So much so I had to get one for my mother.  She got pink and I got that just gorgeous deep green color.  This is the single softest robe I have ever owned.  Even my cat loves its softness, happy to jump in my lap (mush on it for a while aka kneading dough) and snooze.  Unlike a lot of robes/material, this is just as soft on the inside as it is out.  It's shinier on the outside but that doesn't make any difference in softness.  I feel like I got got an incredible deal on both robes.  The price is just right.  And, this is going to be amazing during winter.  It's a robe that will certainly keep you nicely warm and cozy!A couple of things to note, though it's nearly impossible to tell in the pix (pictures), this robe is somewhat cinched in the back in order to show we women have waist lines I suppose.  When I first saw the back I wasn't overly thrilled but it doesn't bother me in the least or make a difference in fit.  I order items like this a size larger than I really need to and it is very comfy and doesn't look sloppy big on me.  That may be worth keeping in mind.Also, I've noticed that some people complain of this fabric pilling on them.  Because of my general choice of clothing (usually 100% cotton), I wash everything I own using the gentle cycle and low heat and haven't had any problems.  I also avoid washing this with towels as they can be a little abrasive in the dryer.I HIGHLY recommend this robe to anyone!

Well, this is one device I can't live without!  Since I upgraded my phone it now has the Lightning adapter.  I didn't even stop to think about my killer dock with its killer sound!  It didn't even have Bluetooth!  But it does now!  Though it can no longer charge my phone, at least I can listen to tunes again!  (Especially with all the problems the 6+ is having with Jambox! Grrr).  I still can't use my Jambox but at least I can use my Logitech speaker "dock."  YEAH!!!

I had never heard of this company until I bought this fan but WOW!  This is one AWESOME fan!  It is expensive but It's worth every dollar I paid for it!  It has 4 speeds.  On the low and medium speeds, it really is whisper quiet.  High speed is a bit louder.  This also has a "turbo" button that will really crank out some air!  Even on turbo it is quieter than just about any fan I've ever owned (which is a LOT!).  I did purchase a ceiling mount from another company for this fan so I'm definitely considering hanging it.The ONLY drawback or complaint I have is that it doesn't tilt quite as low toward the floor as I would like it to.The base is very heavy so this fan isn't going anywhere on you and you can tell immediately on assembly that this fan is high quality.  It has 5 blades rather than the typical three or four and the cage is made of metal, not plastic.  It is extremely easy to put together, no tools needed.  Oh, one more bonus feature is... because of the way the fan is made, you can tell EXACTLY where you're aiming it.  No more guessing or using the fan as a "scope" to try to aim it where you want it.  It is such a handy feature and a rather surprising one I didn't even think of until I had it all set up.
I LIVE in these!  What a deal this is!  4 camis!  These do have shelf bras, not cups but I find them to be of great quality and comfort!  What more can I say?

This is actually the second "Yes" by finishing touch I've purchased within a month.  I just LOVE this little shaver.  It is exactly like the small brow and facial hair trimmers you can buy just about anywhere for around ten bucks EXCEPT this is larger and has a wider head to it.It basically only works when up against the skin which is wonderful for power saving somewhat since the nice bright white light still blinks.  It gives an amazingly close shave.  Plus, I think the name is hilarious.  "Yes" vs "No no!"It comes with a couple of attachments though honestly I don't see the need for them.  It works perfectly without them.  It is rechargeable and charges quickly.  I let my mother try it and she was instantly in love with it.This shaver is IDEAL for those cursed with KP - keratosis pillaris, aka rough bumpy skin since it does not allow the hair to be cut under the bumps but on top of them so the hair can't be reburried yet it gives a nice close shave... Go figure!  I do think the price is a bit high since this is essentially a larger version of a very inexpensive small shaver but I'm not really complaining since it gets the job done anywhere you need it!

These readers are ok but they just don't work for me.  They're attractive but VERY lightweight and delicate.  These would probably work well for those who have trouble with other readers being too tight since these are the loosest readers I've ever purchased.

This is the second flavor of Monster "Muscle" that I've tried.  The first flavor I bought was chocolate.  In my opinion it's just too watery to justify a chocolate flavor.  However I'm very used to drinking chocolate Ensure which is thick, rich and delicious.This vanilla flavor is a whole different story!  It's pretty good and I actually really like it.  How could you possibly beat the combination of high protein AND Monster's energy blend?!?  Of course this has more calories, way more calories compared to Monster Zero or even Monster Rehab (20 cals per can if I'm not mistaken), it has 200 calories total per can but Of course protein alone adds lots of calories.My only issue with this is price.  Boy is this stuff expensive!  You can buy an entire CASE of Monster Zero or even an entire case of Ensure for approximately the same price as this TWELVE pack!  There's just no way I can justify an expense like this.  It might be ok once in a while but definitely not an everyday expense for me anyway!

The paper itself it great.  It really is.  I am new to water based colored pencils though I'm no "real" artist, this paper has withstood all my mistakes and flat out disasters.  I'm a tad bit irked though that this seller has it listed as being 9x11in when it's not, it's just like most "watercolor" paper and is 9x12.  I really don't understand the seller's listing.  Why say it's something it is not?  What's wrong with the truth?  You can see in the description that it does say 9x11.  So another lesson in "reading the fine print” which is where the truth of the paper size is shown.I originally had a second order in for this stuff.  I was lucky I was able to cancel it

I've purchased so many different types of "readers" (on Amazon) over the last several years I couldn't even begin to guess brand names.  I can say that I've purchased only 6 packs (several) and prefer the ones with frames since they're a bit heavier and sturdier.  Some can be found in my reviews.  The ad for these glasses (a set of 4) made some pretty bold claims about clarity and wear & tear!  The claims left me thinking "uh huh, suuure, riiiiiiight!).  But the reason I went ahead and bought a set is because these have a very high review average with LOTS sold.  One of my biggest concerns, other than looks and quality was the fact that the ad mentioned springs.  So as a woman, my thinking was "well peachy...high quality glasses but they have springs that will catch my hair and pull it out strand by strand.  It's something that drives me bat*!?+  Weird or not, I like to be able to slide a pair of glasses on top of my head and use 'em like a headband from time to time so the glasses need to be strong enough to keep my hair back without pulling it out a strand at a time.  And these do!  They can hold back my messy mane and when I take them off there is no hair hanging from the glasses.  These glasses are slightly heavier than my last 6 pack but it's not nearly enough to notice or bother me.I had these less than 24 hours and was SO happy with them I went back and bought the 4 pack that contains red frames!I would recommend these to ANYONE I care about!  These glasses are really just that good!

I never in my life thought I'd be so happy with a pencil sharpener.  But since I've recently rediscovered the zen of "adult coloring" using intricate drawings with colored pencils, this sharpener became quite important.  It really is designed for colored pencils.  I tried several other sharpeners I had around but all the manual ones broke the pencil "led" and the electric one didn't leave enough wood around the color core so once again I was left with broken pencils.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone who uses colored pencils, even if you don't use them regularly.  It really saves a LOT of hassle.

Although this set is really considered costume jewelry, it is REALLY CUTE!  I mean, I was truly surprised when I received this and some of the other items made by the same company.  I think I'm going to tinker around with this and see what I can do to "dress" it up a bit.  Mainly I'd like to replace the chain and see if I can make it last as long as possible.

This is a nifty and very handy screwdriver set.  It's about the size of a regular Sharpie marker, pocket clip and all.  The bits store one in the top and one in the bottom and the bottom is actually the functional slot.  For a couple of bucks?  How could I possibly complain?Oh!  Actually one complaint and it's really more about the seller, not the screwdriver so it would be silly to deduct stars.  For some reason this is listed in the flashlight category.  Being in a rush that day, I thought this might have an LED with a button battery or two.  But, turns out it's just a screwdriver.  My fault for not double checking but maybe another category would help this seller?

WOW!  These 8 ounce cans of Monster Ab Zero are SO CUTE!!!  They are perfect when you need a little extra boost but you don't want to waste a big can or open a big can and lose the carbonation overnight!  It's still Monster Zero so what more can I say?  Oh...how about flavor?  Honestly I have no idea how to explain this flavor!  All I can say is it really is good and much more mello than the Lo-Carb flavor.

This is definitely one of the better recorded fan sounds I've purchased.  It's not a rattling, squeaky, irritating sound that I've come across too many times.  It is also the sound of a static fan rather than an oscillating one. It definitely gives more of a white noise sound than other "fan" MP3s I've purchased over the years.  I've been using this nearly nightly and it's definitely a great way to nod off.  It's all lullaby and goodnight!

Finding the right cable for my iPad has been a multi year quest!  I'm not even joking.  Not even a little.  I absolutely can not believe how many cables I have been through to find one/some that actually meets my needs!I absolutely love, no, make that...like.  I really like these cables a lot.  They are NEARLY perfect.  I bought these because I need SOMETHING with some length to it to charge my iPad while I'm using it as I'm reading and drifting off to sleep.  It has been almost impossible to find cables that are longer than 3 feet but shorter than 10ft that can actually charge my iPad without fizzling out after a few days or MAYBE two weeks!So I came across these cables as a set of three and when I first used one thought "FINALLY!  SOMETHING THAT WORKS!"  The length is PERFECT.  They haven't truly failed in the many months I've owned them (not like some 10 ft or even other 6 ft cables have!)...EXCEPT!...the ONE problem with these cables that drives me NUTS is the fact that they do NOT stay plugged into my iPad.  I finally had my iPad replaced knowing I did have some sort of problem at the 30 pin port.  I thought that would be the end of the cable stress.  It was still happening but it was the same cable I'd been using on the other iPad so I got another new one (of these) out of the pack and of course, even with a brand new iPad the brand new cables kept falling out!I think the real issue is the specs and I mean starting with Apple.  I think Apple expected that every iPad owner would only use their iPads for business while sitting still at their desks at work!  That is just NOT how it works in the REAL WORLD!!!  And not everyone can afford to buy all new equipment with the Lightning adapters.  I think this is a problem I can most likely fix myself but I should NOT have too!  If the manufacturer could make the 30 pin end fit devices a bit more snugly, man I would buy LOTS of these!!!I've come to realize that most 10ft cables will fry when used to charge iPads (resistance issue?  Dunno) and as stated, 3ft cables are useless to me.I must say that even though I have this one (irritating, frustrating, hair pulling) problem with these and all cables, I WILL most definitely purchase them again because they DO NOT FRY and that to me is most important!!!UGH!!!  SO...CLOSE... TO PERFECTION!!!

You know, it is so close to impossible to find the right 30 pin cable for charging our (now old...grr) devices!  As far as my iPhone goes, this cable has been absolutely WONDERFUL!  It works well to charge my iPad as well with a different charger of course but it is a bit short to use my iPad as I typically do which is in bed.Anyway, these cables by Amazon really grip quite well.  I've not had a single one just fall out for no reason.I would be beyond thrilled if Amazon could have this exact same cable lengthened to about 5 feet for my iPad!!!

Oh WOW!  I've had this for a while now and should have posted this review a LONG time ago!  I LOVE this little gadget!I was really surprised when I opened the box and saw how small this speaker box is.  I didn't make note of the size when I bought it so I was pretty skeptical when I first laid eyes on it.  It is 6 inches Wide, 2 1/4 inches Tall, and just under an inch deep!  Well, then I charged it, put it in a safe spot in my bathroom (that's so small it drives me nuts!...the bathroom, not this Jambox) synced it up with my phone and then I almost fell out.  I was absolutely SHOCKED at how much sound and BIG sound at that came out of this little tiny box!Jawbone did an amazing job putting this little Mini Jambox together!If you are looking for something small and compact with great sound, look no further.  I would be shocked if anybody didn't like this!

This belt was recommended to me by a friend who works in pain management for relief of sacro illiac joint pain.  It's a little awkward to wear when the instructions are followed but can be covered by the right pants and definitely by a skirt or dress.My experience with this belt is that my friend was 110% right about this belt!  You do have to be a bit careful to keep it from being too tight because believe me when I say that if you truly have SI joint dysfunction, you WILL feel it!It is however a very highly recommended SI belt and I as a nurse with SI joint pain can vouch for its effectiveness!

This headphone case meant for the LG wireless Bluetooth headphones is a great idea if your packing your headphones away for some reason.  Maybe you have an extra pair and need to safely store a set or know you won't be using them as you travel and pack them in a suitcase.I think however, that this case is a bit too large to be truly portable, to say fit in a purse.  A backpack?  It'd work amazingly well in that case. The LG brand headphones are SO flexible that I think they could very easily be rounded into a smaller circle without hurting the headset.  Of course I am NOT speaking of current small circular zip cases you might find at the drugstore checkout (that are clearly meant for wired earbuds)  Those are WAY too small and would surely lead to wire damage.Making this case smaller and more rounded is my recommendation to make this case truly portable.

Oh boy.  Another not so great review.  So sorry Monster!I am a complete Monster Energy addict!  I absolutely cannot even begin to function without my Monster Absolutely Zero!  When I saw this Extra Strength version, man, I was ALL over it!But sadly, for me personally, the extra strength version did not do any more good for me than the regular strength Monster.  It seems it only drained my wallet faster than usual.I'm sticking to my regular stuff, either the Zero (white or black/blue cans) or the non carbonated Monster "Rehab" (Orange).

Gosh I sure hate leaving a review that even hints at being "bad."The general rule usually says two is better than one.  Unfortunately that is not so with the double row of teeth on these combs.  Of course this is merely my personal experience.  I purchased 3 of them because my favorite comb that I've managed to hold onto for years never seems to be around when I need it.  I can't even guess how many and how many different flea combs I've tried and trashed over the years.  But there's this one single cheap comb I bought years ago that always seems to work the best on my cats.  I cannot comment on the use of these for dogs.What I've noticed with the extra row of teeth is that fleas tend to get caught between the two rows of teeth so it's sometimes very difficult to see if you've picked up any fleas.  Or, if not that, you might get a big ol' fat and full female stuck between the teeth of just one of the rows and that is much more difficult to deal with.Overall, it REALLY seemed like a fantastic idea but in practice, I can get 2-4 times the number of fleas with a single row extra fine comb than I can with a double row comb.

Nice Iron!  This is the first time I've come across a soldering iron that has such a fantastic combination of features.  First, the rubber grip is awesome!  It is very comfortable to hang on to versus the cheaper plastic shelled ones.  The 3 LEDs are a major plus for my purposes and this iron gets hot enough for pretty much all my soldering needs.  Oh, last and definitely not least is cost.  I think the price is just right or better with all that you get including the extra tips.

Once again and quite oddly for me, I find myself at a loss for words over an item that really requires no description but I'll give it a shot anyway.These well priced tongs serve their purpose well.  Not only do the rubber tips help prevent slippage, they do keep the heat from transferring quickly to your hands.  My main use for them is to grab a hot beaker of cosmetic materials from boiling water.
Hmmm...what all can I say about a beaker?  Not much really.  I will say that I found the price more than fair and all four of the beakers I purchased arrived with no damage whatsoever.

I am very happy with this purchase.  This caliper works well and I cannot complain at all about the price.  I believe the description covers just about everything...that it comes with 2 batteries one of which is spare.  It's easy to zero out and you can easily flip from metric to imperial while in the process of measuring an item and the depth gauge is very handy.  Of course I do not need to make serious scientific measurements, but give me a digital caliper any time rather than a micrometer!

Just like everyone says, these are super cute!  As a total beginner with Fimo (Fi-who?), I consider this to be more of a sampler than anything else but I have zero complaints about the product.  I was a little surprised at their size but I realized that even one small 1" stick can do LOTS of nails.  Plus, there are a lot of duplicates in the box if you needed more of a particular design.Again, to agree with pretty much everyone here, you really do need to be careful due to the uncovered, unwrapped  razor blade loose in the box.  Just don't dump the box into your lap then reach down and grab a handful!  YIKES!Ok, please forgive the following comments/suggestions.  I'm a nurse and worrying about others is my job!  So, with that disclaimer I'll say this:  To be perfectly honest, I do think it is a little irresponsible to have an open razor blade somewhere inside the box.  Maybe if were taped to the inside of the box somewhere it wouldn't bug me so much.  When you buy a pack of razor blades here in the States, each one is always individually wrapped in cardboard.There is a tool I keep in my toolbox which I think makes cutting these SO much easier as well as much safer in my opinion.  I'm talking about a scraper that holds regular razor blades.  They are rather inexpensive and I'd recommend getting one to anyone and everyone because not only is it safer since most come with a cap over the blade, it'll give you something to hold onto and help prevent your fingers from accidentally slipping.Another little disclaimer here...I'm not endorsing these sellers or specific products, just giving an example of what I'm talking about:  with these, to safely store the blade, you slide it out and turn the blade upside down so that the sharp edge is inside and covered:http://www.amazon.com/Original-Mini-Razor-Scrapers-Eight/dp/B0045ZVKI2/ref=sr_1_22?ie=UTF8&qid=1407100494&sr=8-22&keywords=razor+blade+scraperThis is the design I use.  I like this style because the blade is snugged in with a screw-knob and also comes with a separate blade cover:http://www.amazon.com/Titan-12031-Mini-Razor-Scraper/dp/B000OEDQQW/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1407100470&sr=8-2&keywords=razor+blade+scraperSigh...one more thing.  I don't recommend blade holders that are made entirely of metal simply because most of them do not lock the blade in place while in use unless specifically mentioned.I hope you find this information helpful!  Happy decorating!

I too really like these colors.  They really are nice and vibrant as someone else stated.  The price does seem a bit high at first but you really get a LOT of product for the price as each bottle contains a full ounce (30ml).  Not only that, but you can also create an infinite number of custom colors from this kit and I personally find that bit of mad science sort of thing kind of fun.Considering that a few drops in an airbrush can go a long way, unless you are a nail pro, this kit should last a long time!

These are some very nice and funky colors!  I really do like this foil.  I'd never worked with foil before so it took a bit of practice.  Overall I am happy with this purchase but I will say that a few of the colors were identical and I was surprised that there wasn't a whole lot of foil in each jar.  But, there is enough to do a countless number of different things to your nails and the variety is great.Honestly, I would consider these to be more of a sampler of different designs.  BUT, for $10?  I feel it was a good purchase.

These nail polish stands/holders are SO nice to have around!  They keep your bottles tilted at just the right angle to make doing your nails much easier.  They are made from a really flexible rubber so not only do they conform to most nail polish bottles, they tend to stay put on a table top so you can just dip your brush in the polish and go.  They really prevent a lot of fumbling around with the bottle and brush.The only disadvantage I can think of is time.  They come from Hong Kong so it takes a while.  But I can certainly live with that since the price is awesome and these are just so handy to have around!

This cuticle tool is absolutely indispensable.  It works very well to get rid of thick or excess cuticle.  I actually prefer this tool over cuticle nippers because this can get more of the excess cuticle than nippers can and it does so quite smoothly... after some practice.I do recommend this tool to anyone, especially those who like to use cuticle nippers but with a bit of a warning to be careful the first few times because this IS sharp and if you move too quickly, you could wind up catching some skin with it.  If you go nice and slow the first time and watch what you're doing, you'll be just fine.

I've reviewed Ensure High Protein Powder once before but it was for the chocolate flavor which I prefer because it is really delicious when used with milk rather than water.  Just writing that nearly makes my mouth water!I purchased this vanilla flavor for a family member who prefers to make her shakes with fruit juices.  She was using some of my chocolate flavor before which she would mix with grape juice...chocolate and grape?  Oh my!  Definitely not my thing!Anyway, the vanilla mixes quite well with grape or just about any other fruit juice.Ensure High Protein is a very high quality product, as is all the other Ensure products.  I would never hesitate to recommend Ensure to anyone!

It was perfect while it lasted....see update and comments... I absolutely LOVE this case!  It has 3 slots for using this as a stand (as opposed to only two slots on a lot of other cases I've purchased).  As stated in the description the case rotates so if you have to use your iPad while it's charging, the cable can be on either side while using it as a stand.  The flowery embossing on the pink one I bought is just gorgeous.  This also has an elastic band that can be used to hang on to the case but it's really there to keep the case/cover closed.The price of this cover is just right.  I tend to go through iPad covers quickly so buying an expensive one is out of the question.  I think I'll get a few more of these in different colors so I can rotate them out from time to time.I'll post an update after I unintentionally destroy it to let y'all know how long it will last.OH MAN!  10.26.14...Well the inevitable has happened.  The covering of the thin edges of the plastic case that holds your iPad in place have peeled off the plastic case.  Thankfully someone asked about it and reminded me I needed to post an update which you can read in the comments of this review.  But as I stated in my reply, I still use this case at night in bed because I haven't found another case with 3 positioning grooves AND the ability to rotate.5-15-15:  Another Update:  TOTALLY TOAST!  It just ripped right down the middle of the back of the case!When the edging came off as I previously stated, I was only disappointed for a short time.  But, I did make a mistake of sorts, I should have taken my iPad out and used some adhesive around the edges.  But, it is something I should NOT have to do!  Unfortunately,  I STILL can't find another case I like!!!  I have so many cases now it's just stupid!  The issue is those dadgum grooves!  I HAVE TO have more than TWO in order to be able to use my iPad in my bed!  I have one position for games, another for reading.  I just do not understand WHY it is SO hard to find another case similar to this one as far as how it's set up...just not how it is MADE!  I've essentially resigned myself to the fact that I may have to buy one of these every 6-12 months!  Thank goodness they are CHEAP!!!!SUGGESTIONS MORE THAN WELCOME

Wow!  This stuff is STRONG!!!I'd never heard of VHB tape until I saw a show on the History (2) Channel.  I think it was "Modern Marvels" that was all about sticky stuff.  On the show it mentioned that this stuff (specifically this 3M brand) is actually used in building, using it to attach GLASS...those huge glass panels such as those on a skyscraper to the building.  I was blown away thinking "they're using TAPE to hold up those HUGE glass panels?!?"  I'm quite sure though that the VHB they use is MUCH wider than this!  lolAnyway, we needed something to hold our large window valences (for 1" blinds) in place since the plastic clips aren't the easiest things to work with, especially since it's so hard to find the right ones.  Well, we used small pieces of this double sided VHB tape and Voilà!  They are stuck but good now!A tip...make sure to press and hold for a little bit.  It will most definitely make short work of projects that require a strong double sided bond!

I have never had any luck whatsoever getting my dog or my cats for that matter to willingly take meds or vitamins that claim to be edible and yummy without having to resort to tricks....until now!My dog actually likes the liver taste of this supplement.  I was really, really surprised when I watched her pick up the first one then ate it like it was a treat!  She gave me that "MORE PLEASE" look afterward.  Of course that's wonderful but we have to be sure to put them up where she can't get to them.  Her breed is notorious for "counter surfing!"If you are in need of a joint supplement for your dog, I highly recommend these!

These stencils are not like the metal nail plates that you see with nail stamping. These are truly thin and flexible yet strong. You can quite easily fold one around a nail to paint your design. However, I am not good at using typical design polishes to create these patterns so I purchased them to use strictly with an airbrush system. There are some very nice airbrush polish sets available here on Amazon that could easily be used to create a nearly infinite number of combinations! If you already have a makeup airbrush system then you can simply use that as long as you either get a second airbrush (recommended) or you get a cleaner that will thoroughly clean out the polish prior to using it again for makeup. There are several good cleaners here on Amazon. I would recommend that you disassemble the airbrush for cleaning. It is very simple to do!

I purchased this case because I needed something to hold my iPad and I needed it like yesterday since the one I was using broke.  I can't complain about the price, no doubt.  This cover looks great and it has a couple of slots for use as a stand which is a "must have" for me.  My only issue with it is that because it does not rotate, my charging cable winds up on the wrong side for me when in bed because I sleep on the left side of the bed and my outlet is also on the left.  If you don't mind the cable hanging out the right hand side then no worries.

If you are looking for a sturdy stand for your soldering iron then this is it.  I was really surprised by the weight of this stand when it arrived.  It is heavy for a soldering iron stand.  My iron stays put very well as this stand is not easy to knock over or be pulled over by a power cord or the weight of an iron.  There is nothing flimsy about it.  It really is heavy duty and was well worth the higher cost compared to lots of stands I looked at.  So, if you are on the fence about paying a little extra, have no fear.  This is the right one to buy!

Normally when someone asks me what kinds of things I like, gadgets is usually my first answer (well, maybe motorcycles but that's clearly irrelevant to this review...lol).  The only exception to my affinity for gadgets is gadgets made for PETS.  I cannot even begin to recall how many things... gadgets I've purchased for pets in my lifetime.  Nearly all of them had one single thing in common, they are junk and break after only a few uses.However, with that being said, Andis has restored my faith in pet gadgets.I purchased this small De-Shedder as well as the large size.  These De-Shedders+ are really great.  I am so impressed with the thought that went into the design.  One of the most important things when it comes to gadgets used on cats is NOISE!  Wait, there's one thing more important than that.  The item has to actually work without falling apart.  Anyway, these are very, very quiet.  Even my more skittish (previously feral) cats aren't scared of it.  Plus the oscillation is very smooth which is a major bonus.  I was skeptical that an oscillating rake could make much difference over a standard non-electronic one but I was was wrong.  It really does make a difference.  It helps tremendously.I have a cat with an extremely long, thin, and silky smooth coat.  Nothing worked to grab all the hair from her that I know is there because she proves it in a most unfortunate way.  Ugh!  Even "slicker" type brushes can't do the job.  But, this device works extraordinarily well on her.Pros (in no particular order):  quality, price, effective, quiet, smooth action, cordlessCons:  I can't think of a single oneOther comments I have about this are:  This small size is perfect for cats.  It glides gently over heads, right between the ears.  At times I do wish I'd purchased the medium size to use on the rest of the cats' body because the large is best for dogs.  The one exception to that however is I can use the large size on my ginormous 30lb Russian Blue.  He's not fat, he's just huge!  I will say that these De-Shdders+ seem to be best for fine hair.  For instance I can't really use this on my Australian Shepherd with her thick coarse coat.  I have to use a much more widely spaced rake on her that curves at the tip to help get rid of her undercoat each summer.

After using a popular water based airbrush foundation, I quickly realized that for my dry skin it was not working out very well...AT ALL.  It seemed all it did was dry my skin even more than it already is, making my face feel tight and shriveled and rather than hiding or minimizing wrinkles, they got worse!  It was certainly not any better than ALL of the makeup liquid and powder that make the claim on late night infomercials to be good, if not PERFECT for dry skin.  Rather than hiding my crow's feet wrinkles around my eyes, it made them worse no matter how much moisturizer I used prior to spraying on the water based make up.One day I remembered that somewhere along the the way I heard about a silicone based airbrush makeup.  With my medical background, I started thinking about how silicone is used in the medical field.  It helps to decrease scars (surgical or "uh oh" scars) and is often prescribed to burn victims for severe scaring by means of silicone infused or lined garments.So, with all that in mind I went looking for that silicone based airbrush makeup that I was sure I'd heard about and here it is.  I absolutely love this makeup.  It actually refines the appearance of and sits quite nicely on my skin.  I don't get that tightness that I would feel from the watery stuff as it dried and dried my skin right along with it.  Belloccio's formula uses dimethicone which is so silky soft.  It is used in a lot of primers these days but often IS the primer itself.I definitely recommend Belloccio's airbrush makeup to anyone, particularly anyone who has dry skin.

I really like this stuff even though my mother's cat did not appreciate it one little bit!  My mother's cat has a problem with her skin around her rear end.  I won't go into details about the cause of her problem because I would really hate to cause anyone to lose their lunch!Anyway, this is a fabulous way to very gently clean her raw skin around the area and it sure as heck beats bathing her because I'm pretty sure she could receive the world record on the kitty high jump in the extreme heavy weight class!  It helps a ton that the cat doesn't have to be physically touched to clean her raw skin saving her (and me) pain and misery.

These Virtual Cycle Ride DVDs really keep my exercise routine from being mundane.  I own several of them.  Therefore, I can rotate them on a daily basis with three rides on each DVD, it gives you lots of variety.I had bi-lateral knee replacement about six months ago and must do an exercise routine daily.  However, I find that these DVDs are really helping me during these exercise routines as well as on they do when I use the stationary bike or treadmill.  By using these great DVDs you don't focus so much on the exercise as you do on the scenery...makes my workout go faster.This DVD is high quality HD with brilliant, clear images and great nature sounds.  I enjoy the ever changing scenery on each of the three rides.  I especially enjoy looking at the history town.I hope you will continue to add to this library of exercise videos as they help to make exercising more enjoyable and interesting.  I love to travel and see new places. Now I can without even interrupting my exercise program...

What a great way to add a little something interesting to your exercise routine.  I believe this DVD would be great with a trendmill routine, too...except that the second ride might be a bit too fast.  The second ride was actually my favorite even though it was a bit faster.  I loved the beautiful hues of fall.  I could almost hear the crackling leaves as I ran through the forest.I think what makes this DVD special besides the high quality of the videography and sound is that each ride actually offers changing scenes as you ride through the forest.  I enjoyed the nature sounds, too.  The birds chirping added to the overall realistic feeling of actual being in a forest.Great DVD.  It's like a cycle ride through the woods without leaving your home or gym.  For a longer workout the tracks loop for continuous play.

This is an amazingly beautiful set of HD high quality DVDs.  If you enjoy the ocean, coral, colorful fish and sea creatures, you will love this set.  It is professionally filmed.  My favorite of the pair is the Tropical Freshwater Aquarium DVD.  It gives you five different sound options from a tropical rain forest to bubbles.  The colors and scene choices offer a wide variety for viewing.  All the scenes loop for continuous play or they may be looped together for non interrupted viewing of the whole DVD.The other DVD is also lovely and offers a lovely coral reef scene or a choice of six other tropical aquarium scenes.  Each scene is colorful, high quality HD and sound, and has a choice of sound options from soft music to nature sounds.  There is also a wide variety of fish, ocean creatures and backgrounds.  No shaking or poor quality filming.  This is a great set for aquarium lovers.  Very relaxing.

This is one of my favorite aquarium DVD sets.  There is a total of six different aquariums to choose from that include lots of colorful tropical fish and backgrounds.  I really enjoyed the diversity of the scenes and all the bright colored fish.  There is a fish that looks like a rainbow and no matter how many times I look at this DVD, it still looks amazing.The sound accompaniment can be aquarium bubbles, music or waves. The sounds are all high quality and well recorded. All the filming is clear and HD high color.  There is no shaking or panning.  It is as if you were watching your own tropical aquarium at your house.I like that the World Nature Videos/ISIS products don't just give you two or three minutes of a scene and then loop it.  They give you at least ten minutes of a changing scene and then it loops individually or can be looped together with the other scenes.There is even a night aquarium which is something unusual and beautiful. I love this set and highly recommend it.

This is an absolutely beautiful set of HD DVDs of the ocean and its many inhabitants.  The first DVD is an hour long film of the ocean with everything from starfish to sea turtles.  My favorite scene is the sea horses as they gracefully glide through the ocean plants and sea.  This DVD will loop for extended uninterrupted viewing.The second DVD offers six diverse scenes of the ocean, which can be looped individually or all together. The scenes on both DVDs are clear, professionally recorded as evidenced by the high quality, offer great sound options of waves or music.  The second one even offers the sounds of the ocean combined with music as an option.Great set for just relaxing or for use during meditation. I am sure you will enjoy this set and also find some creatures that you didn't even know existed.  Some of the creatures even seem to glow.

This is a fantastic HD DVD set.  The footage has clarity, brilliant color and it is apparent that it was professionally filmed.  The first DVD is an hour of different parts of the reef which shows various coral and sea life.  This can be played with ambient music or the sound of ocean waves.  It is very realistic and makes you feel as if you were sitting in the ocean just watching the creatures swim around you.The second DVD has six different scenes of sections of the reef and you can play just one or loop all of them for uninterrupted infinite viewing.  Each scene can be played with your choice of ambient music, waves or piano music for a totally relaxing experience.  This is great for meditation or as background on your television or computer screen while you are reading.

A true nature lover's paradise with brilliant, colorful tropical birds in their natural habitat.  Excellent clarity, color and professionally filmed.  No shaking or panning to disturb the beauty of the nature footage.  There are six segments on this lovely high quality HD DVD.  There is also a nature film which includes the birds and nature sounds with lovely piano music in the background.  I especially enjoyed the waterfall scenes and the monsoon segment complete with the sounds of a gentle rain or piano music your choice.This makes a lovely addition to any collection of ambient DVDs with its high quality sound and brilliant colorful scenes.  Amazing videography captures a diverse selection of colorful exotic birds as well as stunning scenery from a rustic birdbath scene to waterfalls that gently flow down the side of a small embankment.

Very nice DVD.  HD high quality 4K, excellent clarity and brilliant color full fireplace fires.  This colorful HD DVD features a choice of three clear and vibrant fires or all can be played together and will loop continuously for a relaxing evening. My favorite part of this DVD is the fact that the whole fire shows clearly and burns down as an actual fire does. I prefer the natural sounds of the fire as it crackles and burns. However, you can add lovely piano music if you prefer. There is an hour worth of footage on this DVD and as I mentioned it does loop continuous for uninterrupted enjoyment.Pamela L

Brilliant HD color and clarity, high quality sound choices and 18 different scenes to choose from, which includes six sea, six lake and  six river aquarium scenes. There is even a shipwreck and lovely Asian temple complete with swimming marine life. I really like the fact that these DVDs will play on a continuous loop or you can play all the scenes on each DVD continuously. There are several sound choices to choose from also, which include bubbles, waves or ambient music. These are lovely DVDs with many options for personalizing them.These are all lovely, however my favorite is surprisingly the river aquarium dvd, I love the colorful Amazon scene. I highly recommend this set.

Very relaxing.  Brilliant color filmed in HD.  It's like having your own aquarium without all the mess.  There are 4 different scenes of  tropical reef aquariums and one HD film from which to choose.  The aquariums may be viewed with a choice of bubbles, relaxing piano music or sounds of the sea.  My personal favorite is the colorful HD film which fades from one scene to the next.  I love the sea horses as they do their graceful dance through the ocean plants.This is a high quality, relaxing dvd that gives you several options to choose from.  It is easy to use and will loop for continuous uninterrupted viewing.  I own many of Tony Helsloot's DVDs and love them all.  High quality with a variety of scenes.  All are great for meditation, to help you fall asleep or just to relax with.  High recommend this DVD.

I love this video.  The footage is realistic, high quality and the sounds are just like that of a real fireplace.  I appreciate the fact that you can choose from one of several fireplaces and they can be played continuously.  Music can be added by itself or with the natural sounds of a fireplace.  This is HD quality and does not shake or zoom in on the screen.  It is like looking at a real fireplace without the warmth.  If you add a campfire or pine scented candle in the room gives a very complete relaxation experience.I own over twenty of the World Nature Videos and I have found all of them to be high quality and colorful with realistic sound and many scene choices.  I have purchased many relaxation dvds and these are among the finest available.

High Quality Sound and HD video.  Can choose one of the fireplaces complete with crackling sounds of a real fire or the lovely winter scenery complete with ambient melodies.  Harp music, ambient music or Christmas tunes can be mixed with the sounds of the fireplace.
